courses.title: VPN e ADVPN FortiGate: Guia Completo | Do Zero ao Avançado!
courses.bio: Tudo sobre VPN e ADVPN no FortiGate: teoria, prática, laboratórios e cenários do mundo real!
objectives: Criar e gerenciar VPNs IPsec site-to-site no FortiGate
Implementar VPNs de acesso remoto seguras para usuários externos
Configurar e otimizar ADVPN para ambientes complexos e dinâmicos
Entender na prática como funciona o roteamento dinâmico em túneis VPN
Utilizar BGP ou outros protocolos junto ao ADVPN
Aplicar boas práticas de segurança e troubleshooting em VPNs

Configurando VPN - Dial-UP: Criando um túnel VPN - Dial-UP (sem mode config)
Criando um túnel VPN - Dial-UP (com mode config)
Laboratório 1: Como habilitar ADVPN entre meus equipamentos?
Laboratório 2: Criando nova VPN e roteamento BGP
Simulando a limitação entre redes overlays diferentes
Solucionando e validando ADVPN entre diferentes redes overlay!

requirements: Conhecimentos básicos de redes (endereçamento IP, sub-redes, etc.)
Noções gerais sobre firewalls ou segurança de redes (desejável, mas não obrigatório)
Acesso a um FortiGate real ou ao FortiGate VM (para praticar)
Vontade de aprender na prática, criando e testando laboratórios
courses.description:
Quer dominar VPN e ADVPN no FortiGate? Este curso foi criado para levar você do zero até configurações avançadas, combinando teoria, prática e projetos reais.
Vamos começar pelos conceitos essenciais de VPN, explicar como funcionam os túneis IPsec e mostrar passo a passo como criar VPNs site-to-site e de acesso remoto. Em seguida, avançaremos para o poderoso recurso ADVPN, aprendendo como implementar e otimizar conexões dinâmicas entre filiais, garantindo alta performance e menor latência.
Ao longo das aulas, você vai entender diferenças entre VPN route-based e policy-based, boas práticas de segurança, roteamento dinâmico integrado (como BGP) e estratégias para alta disponibilidade e failover. Tudo isso com demonstrações práticas, usando FortiGate real ou FortiGate VM, para que você veja na prática como aplicar cada configuração.
Ideal para administradores de rede, analistas de segurança, estudantes ou profissionais que querem entregar projetos completos e seguros com FortiGate. Mesmo que você nunca tenha criado uma VPN, vai acompanhar e construir seu próprio ambiente de testes.
Ao final, você estará apto a:
Planejar, configurar e gerenciar VPNs seguras
Implementar ADVPN para redes complexas
Fazer troubleshooting e ajustes avançados
Aplicar as melhores práticas de mercado
Invista no seu crescimento profissional e torne-se referência em VPN e ADVPN com FortiGate!
target_audience: Profissionais de redes e segurança que desejam aprender a configurar VPN e ADVPN em FortiGate
Analistas e administradores que já trabalham com FortiGate e querem evoluir do básico ao avançado
Estudantes de TI ou segurança da informação que desejam incluir FortiGate e VPN no portfólio
Consultores, prestadores de serviço e freelancers que precisam entregar projetos de VPN com qualidade
Quem quer se preparar para provas, certificações ou projetos práticos envolvendo Fortinet

courses.bio: pénétrations systèmes, Hacking Système, Hacking distant, Anonymat
objectives: MAITRISE DES TECHNIQUES DE HACKING DISTANT
ATTEINDRE DES SYSTEMES HORS RESEAU
HACKING DE N'IMPORTE QUEL SYSTEME DISTANT
ETRE ANONYME
requirements: AVOIR AU MOIN UNE PETITE BASE : hacking-ethique-les-bases-solides-du-hacking-hacker
courses.description:
Ce que vous allez apprendre
MAITRISE DES TECHNIQUES DE HACKING DISTANT
ATTEINDRE DES SYSTEMES HORS RESEAU
HACKING DE N'IMPORTE QUEL SYSTEME DISTANT
ETRE ANONYME


ce cours est un cours professionnel qui vous permets d'avoir un niveau tres avancé en securite et avoir des methodes assez cachez et facile à utiliser.
Un hacker qui ne sais pas faire du hacking distant ou Hacking étant anonyme sera vraiment très vite dans la honte car pour un pentest distant il ne saura le faire.


Tous les chapitres sont enregistrés en HD 1080p pour que vous puissiez tout voir clairement pendant le cours (vous pouvez regarder les previews gratuits).
Je répondrai personnellement à vos questions vous en avez, et je fournirai autant d'aide que possible pour vous aider à maîtriser le réseau et Windows serveur.
N'attendez plus et cliquez sur Suivre ce cours en haut à droite. C'est parti !


Avez-vous marre de refaire toutes vos pages et tous vos comptes des réseaux sociaux à cause des pirates de l’internet ?
Réussissez à empêcher cela grâce à cette formation qui vous permettra des connaitre les failles de votre système de sécurité.
les hackers éthiques sont des profils de plus en plus recherchés car précieux pour les entreprises qui les emploient. Si toi aussi tu te sens une âme de Mr Robot, sans vouloir basculer du côté obscur de la force, découvre vite ce métier.
S’il y a un moment pour se mettre au hacking éthique, c’est maintenant. Vous êtes prêt à vous y mettre ? Voici une formation pour débutant où vous pouvez acquérir les connaissances et certifications nécessaires pour commencer votre carrière de hacker éthique.
Le hacking éthique semble être une carrière prometteuse pour les années à venir. Cybersecurity Ventures prévoit que les dépenses mondiales en sécurité informatique vont dépasser le trillion de dollars entre 2017 et 2021. Une telle croissance inclura sans aucun doute des investissements en hackers éthiques, qui bénéficient déjà d’un salaire moyen supérieur à 70 000 $ par an.
1️⃣ Les conditions de travail
Les hackers éthiques sont souvent employés par des grosses entreprises dans des industries de pointe ou par des sociétés de services informatiques. Férus d'informatique, ils ne comptent pas leurs heures pour trouver et résoudre des failles découvertes dans les systèmes d'information.
2️⃣ Comment devenir hacker éthique ?
Le métier d'hacker éthique n'est pas encore vraiment reconnu en tant que tel dans les entreprises, même si cela tend à changer. Des diplômes dédiés à ce poste existent ainsi que des certifications, mais la plupart des professionnels ont suivi des formation en ligne.
3️⃣ Le salaire d’un hacker éthique
Expert en sécurité informatique et réseaux, un hacker éthique peut prétendre à une rémunération comprise entre 6.000 et 7.500 euros bruts mensuels selon son expérience. Beaucoup d'entre eux sont également de plus en plus rémunérés sous forme de récompenses à la résolution d'un bug grâce aux plateformes de bug bounty.
4️⃣ Les perspectives d’évolution d’un hacker éthique
Aux États-Unis, il n'est pas rare que des hackers autodidactes estampillés « white hat » et résolvant des bugs via des plateformes de bug bounty soient par la suite embauchés par les entreprises victimes de ces bugs (Google, Facebook...). En France, les hackers éthiques sont souvent, à la base, des experts en systèmes d'information ou des experts sécurité et réseaux, formés par la suite en cybercriminalité. Il s'agit plus d'une évolution de poste que d'un véritable changement de fonction.
5️⃣ Entreprises qui emploient des hackers éthiques
industrie ;
sociétés de services informatiques ;
administrations ;
banques ;
sociétés du numérique.
Enfin, afin de vous proposer la formation la plus complète possible sur Udemy je m'engage à :
Répondre à vos questions rapidement (Merci de m'envoyer un message sur la rubrique Q&R de Udemy)
Ajouter des cas pratiques à la demande (Merci de m'envoyer un message sur la rubrique Q&R de Udemy si vous avez une proposition)
Accompagner les participants avec des cas pratiques et autres sources utiles à leur réalisation.
Ces ajouts de vidéos seront, bien entendu, gratuits si vous avez acquis la formation.
Je reste disponible dans la rubrique Question/Réponses d'Udemy pour répondre à vos questions.

Il ne me reste que plus qu'à vous souhaiter une bonne formation !
target_audience: HACKER
ETUDIANT
TOUT LE MONDE

courses.title: Cibersegurança com IA Generativa
courses.bio: Como defender contra ataques a sistemas, engenharia social, malware, e outras formas de intrusão potenciadas por Gen AI.
objectives: Comp revenir ataques de hacking potenciados por gen AI
Como identificar conteúdo malicioso, falso e/ou sintético criado por gen AI
Como desenvolver e implementar mecanismos de defesa contra ameaças generativas avançadas
Como integrar estas defesas nos sistemas e processos da sua organização
requirements: Conhecimento básico de hacking e cibersegurança é recomendado, mas não necessário
Conhecimento básico do que é a IA generativa (gen AI), e o tipo de conteúdo que pode produzir, também é recomendado, mas não necessário
courses.description:
HACKING GENERATIVO
A Gen AI está a mudar o mundo de vários modos. Mas em alguns casos, como para hackers, não num bom sentido.
Mais que nunca, torna-se necessário ser capaz de identificar - e deflectir - ataques e intrusões que utilizam Gen AI.
O que não é fácil, considerando a velocidade, escala e conveniência que esta permite a atacantes.
Neste curso, iremos cobrir todos os tipos principais de ataques com Gen AI, defesas principais, e como as implementar.




DEIXE-ME CONTAR-LHE... TUDO
Algumas pessoas - como eu - querem sempre saber tudo o que está incluído em algo.
E, por isto, eu quero dizer, TUDO, o que está incluído.
Portanto, segue aqui uma lista de tudo o que é coberto neste curso:
Irá aprender sobre os principais meios e canais de ataque quando os atacantes utilizam conteúdo generativo, incluindo vulnerabilidades em infraestrutura e redes wireless (phishing, APs falsos, etc feitos com Gen AI), vulnerabilidades em endpoints (exploradas com phishing ou engenharia social com gen AI), configurações vulneráveis (identificadas e exploradas com gen AI) e falhas em processos de identidade e autenticação (utilizando Gen AI para obter contas e/ou escalar privilégios);
Irá aprender sobre as maiores abordagens de ataque com Gen AI, incluindo análise automatizada de ataques, a criação de malware customizado ou polmórfico (usando informação sobre os alvos com Gen AI), identificação e contorno de defesas (usar Gen AI para identificar padrões de detecção a evitar), e envenanmento de dados/modelos (comprometer dados de treino, ou modelos treinados em si, para obter maus outputs), as suas características e prevenção;
Irá aprender sobre como defender contra ataques que usam Gen AI, incluindo defesas de alvo móvel (dificultar a identificação de vulnerabilidades através de alterações frequentes), engano adaptativo (usar elementos como honeypots ou honeytokens, mas dinâmicos), arquitecturas zero-trust (nunca considerar alguém "seguro/a"), e robustez adversarial e robustez contra prompts (impedir modelos de serem usados com inputs maliciosos);
Irá aprender sobre como utilizar Gen AI, em si, nas defesas, incluindo modelos de texto semelhantes ao ChatGPT, incluindo automatizar a análise de vulnerabilidades, a detecção de ameaças, a gestão de patches e versões de software, e a automatização de defesas adaptativas;
Irá aprender sobre como os processos organizacionais se alteram com a introdução da Gen AI, incluindo que sistemas de mudança existentes mudam/não mudam e que novos surgem, como integrar scans de vulnerabilidades com Gen AI em CI/CD, como utilizar Gen AI como parte de ZTAs e revisões de acesso em específico, como automatizar tarefas de segurança em si (incluindo como parte de Resposta a Incidentes);




O MEU CONVITE PARA SI
Lembre-se de que tem sempre uma garantia de 30 dias de devolução, pelo que não existe risco para si.
Sugiro também que faça uso dos vídeos de preview grátis, para garantir que o curso é do seu agrado. Não quero que desperdice o seu tempo ou dinheiro.
Se acha que este curso é apropriado para si, e que pode levar o seu conhecimento ao próximo nível... seria um prazer tê-lo/a como aluno/a.
Vemo-nos no interior do curso!
target_audience: Profissionais de cibersegurança que se foquem em prevenir intrusões/ataques
Profissionais de áreas relacionadas com dados ou segurança que melhor queiram proteger a sua organização
Qualquer profissional de uma organização que queira estar melhor preparado/a contra ataques com Gen AI

• Effectuer la configuration de base des routeurs Cisco.
• Mettre en place un réseau local (LAN) avec plusieurs équipements.
• Configurer les routeurs pour assurer la connectivité de bout en bout entre les périphériques

courses.description:
Vous souhaitez acquérir des compétences solides en configuration réseau et comprendre le fonctionnement des équipements Cisco ? Ce cours est conçu pour vous !
Destiné aux débutants comme aux professionnels souhaitant renforcer leurs bases, ce module vous permettra de maîtriser les étapes essentielles pour configurer un réseau de proximité (LAN) en assurant une connectivité fiable entre les différents équipements.
- Objectifs du cours :
À l’issue de cette formation, vous serez capable de :
Comprendre le rôle des équipements Cisco dans un réseau d’entreprise.
Effectuer la configuration de base des commutateurs (switch) et routeurs Cisco.
Mettre en place un réseau local (LAN) avec plusieurs équipements.
Configurer et tester la connectivité de bout en bout entre les périphériques.
Utiliser les commandes de base de l’interface CLI sur les équipements Cisco.
.
Contenu du cours :
- Mise en place de Packet Tracer
- Prise en main de l’environnement CLI (Command Line Interface)
- Configuration initiale d’un switch Cisco :
Utilisation des modes Console, Telnet et SSH
Configuration du hostname
Activation des différents modes avec mot de passe
Configuration de l’interface virtuelle
Configuration de la passerelle par défaut
Cryptage mot de passe
Configuration du mode SSH
Sauvegarde de la configuration
Accès à Distance pour administration
-Configuration initiale d’un routeur Cisco :
Toutes les Configurations de bases
Configuration des interfaces
Routage statique de base
Test de la connectivité IP
Utilisation des commandes de diagnostic
-Mise en place d’un réseau de proximité complet avec connectivité entre plusieurs équipements
- Toutes ces opérations de configurations se feront essentiellement en pratique sur Packet Tracer, le simulateur réseau de Cisco
Prêt à développer vos compétences en réseau ? Rejoignez-moi dès maintenant !
target_audience: •	Débutants souhaitant s’initier aux réseaux Cisco •
•	Techniciens réseau débutants ou en reconversion
•       Informaticiens souhaitant acquérir des bases solides en configuration d’équipements Cisco

courses.title: Hacking Series - Wordpress - Easy to Medium Difficulty
courses.bio: Wordpress Penetration Test - Information Gathering, Eksploit, Mengakses root hingga menanam Webshell-Backdoor
objectives: Kita akan belajar proses Information Gathering seperti nmap, directory enumeration, scanning vulnerability dan mencari exploit yang dibutuhkan
Kita akan belajar melakukan exploit, mengkonfigurasi dan inject webshell atau membikin reverse shell
Kita akan mempelajari bagaimana melakukan Privilege Escalation dari initial access dengan belajar mencari tahu kelemahan yang ada pada target
Kita akan mencoba mencari flag dengan berbagai tingkat privilege yang didapat
Disertakan materi tambahan khusus untuk lebih mudah melakukan Post Exploitation attack yang tentunya tidak selalu ada pada lembaga pembelajaran lainnya
Kita juga akan ada cara mendownload lab dan melakukan konfigurasi lab dengan cara yang mudah
requirements: Diharapkan bagi yang akan mengikuti ini sudah bisa menggunakan komputer dan sudah mampu melakukan instalasi software dan bisa menggunakan browser. Untuk skill lain yang dibutuhkan dalam menyelesaikan kursus ini akan diajarikan dalam kursus ini dengan pelan-pelan.
Dalam mengikuti materi ini dibutuhkan instalasi VirtualBox untuk menjalankan Lab. Dibutuhkan juga Linux (bisa Linux distro Ubuntu, Debian atau Kali Linux)
Dibutuhkan Discord apabila ingin join dengan Server kami dan bertanya-tanya terkait materi.
courses.description:
Penetration Test, atau yang sering disebut sebagai “Pentest,” adalah uji keamanan yang dilakukan dengan meluncurkan serangan siber simulasi untuk menemukan kerentanan dalam sistem komputer. Para penetration tester adalah profesional keamanan yang terampil dalam seni peretasan etis, yaitu penggunaan alat dan teknik peretasan untuk memperbaiki kelemahan keamanan daripada menyebabkan kerusakan. Perusahaan mempekerjakan pen tester untuk meluncurkan serangan simulasi terhadap aplikasi, jaringan, dan aset lainnya. Dengan melakukan serangan palsu ini, pen tester membantu tim keamanan mengungkap kerentanan keamanan kritis dan meningkatkan postur keamanan secara keseluruhan. Jadi, Pentest ini merupakan kegiatan yang sangat penting untuk mengidentifikasi dan memperbaiki kerentanan sebelum penyerang yang sebenarnya memanfaatkannya.
Course ini akan mengajarkan langkah-langkah proses Penetration Test, dan untuk lebih spesifiknya kita akan mencari kelemahan pada platform Wordpress. WordPress adalah platform pembuatan situs web yang bersifat open-source. Secara teknis, WordPress adalah sistem manajemen konten (CMS) yang ditulis dalam bahasa PHP dan menggunakan basis data MySQL. Dalam bahasa yang lebih sederhana, WordPress adalah alat pembuat blog dan situs web yang paling mudah dan bagus saat ini.
Namun seringkali kita melihat situs-situs penting yang menggunakan Wordpress dirusak oleh Hacker. Misalnya dilakukan defacing maupun ditanamkan sebuah halaman sebagai iklan slot gacor. Nah, kenapa situs Wordpress ini bisa dihack padahal Wordpress ini merupakan platform yang sangat banyak digunakan didunia?
Course ini akan melakukan pembahasan mulai dari Information Gathering, Directory Enumeration, Eksploitasi, menanam Webshell, proses privilege escalation, mendapatkan hak akses root hingga bagaimana menanam backdoor.
Tentunya course ini dibawahkan secara step-by-step agar teman-teman bisa melihat proses detil terkait proses ini. Dalam course ini tentunya teman-teman akan mempelajari berbagai jenis tools untuk melakukan scanning, mencari vulnerability, bagaimana mencari eksploit yang sesuai untuk vulnerability yang terdeteksi.
Kita juga akan mengenal proses tambahan dimana terdapat case apabila dalam melakukan scanning tidak menemukan vulnerability apapun. Bagaimana kita dapat menemukan vulnerability berikutnya.
Dalam course ini juga telah diberikan banyak materi tambahan yang berupa tips-tips lain yang mungkin tidak diajarkan di learning center lain.
Besar harapan kami agar course ini dapat memberikan pijakan awal untuk teman-teman dapat mengerjakan lab lain yang dapat membantu dalam belajar untuk event CTF tournament, maupun memberikan skill basic awal untuk mengawali Langkah teman-teman untuk mengambil sertifikasi Internasional.
Kami juga akan menyediakan beberapa course lab lain yang akan menjelaskan proses-proses Penetration Test dengan tingkat kesulitan yang berbeda.
target_audience: Cyber Security Enthusiast atau orang yang ingin mulai belajar tentang Cyber Security terutama Red Team. Kursus ini akan menyediakan gambaran yang cukup bagaimana proses-proses kegiatan Penetration Test atau Red Team dilakukan.
Bagi anda yang ingin meningkatkan skill Cyber Security anda, disini juga akan menambah tips trick maupun beberapa ilmu tambahan dalam meningkatkan kemampuan Anda
Cyber Security beginner yang ingin belajar bagaimana cara menggunakan exploit

courses.title: Quản trị hệ thống Linux theo chứng chỉ quốc tế LPIC-1
courses.bio: Hướng dẫn quản trị hệ thống Linux theo chứng chỉ quốc tế LPIC-1
objectives: Hiểu rõ các khái niệm cơ bản và nâng cao của hệ điều hành Linux.

requirements: Kiến thức cơ bản về máy tính và hệ điều hành: Học viên nên có hiểu biết cơ bản về cách sử dụng máy tính và các khái niệm về hệ điều hành như thư mục, tệp tin, và cài đặt phần mềm.

Kinh nghiệm sử dụng dòng lệnh (không bắt buộc nhưng là một lợi thế): Mặc dù không bắt buộc, nhưng nếu học viên đã từng sử dụng dòng lệnh trên bất kỳ hệ điều hành nào (Linux, macOS, hoặc Windows Command Prompt) sẽ có lợi thế trong việc học và nắm bắt các khái niệm nhanh hơn.
courses.description:
Chào bạn,
Khóa học "Quản trị Hệ thống Linux theo Chứng chỉ Quốc tế LPIC-1" được thiết kế nhằm cung cấp cho học viên những kiến thức và kỹ năng cần thiết để trở thành một quản trị viên hệ thống Linux chuyên nghiệp.
Trong khóa học, học viên sẽ hiểu rõ các khái niệm từ cơ bản đến nâng cao của hệ điều hành Linux, sử dụng thành thạo các lệnh và công cụ quản trị hệ thống. Nội dung khóa học bao gồm việc thiết lập và quản lý hệ thống tệp, quy trình, người dùng, cũng như cài đặt, cấu hình và bảo trì các dịch vụ mạng trên Linux.
Khóa học đồng thời chuẩn bị cho học viên các kiến thức cần thiết để vượt qua kỳ thi chứng chỉ LPIC-1, mang đến nền tảng vững chắc trong công việc quản trị hệ thống Linux.
Mục tiêu khóa học:
Hiểu rõ các khái niệm từ cơ bản đến nâng cao về hệ điều hành Linux.
Thành thạo việc sử dụng các lệnh và công cụ quản trị hệ thống Linux.
Thiết lập và quản lý hệ thống tệp, tiến trình và user.
Cài đặt, cấu hình, và bảo trì các dịch vụ mạng trên hệ thống Linux.
Đạt được kiến thức và kỹ năng cần thiết để thi đỗ chứng chỉ LPIC-1.
Điều kiện tham gia:
Có kiến thức cơ bản về máy tính và hệ điều hành.
Kinh nghiệm sử dụng dòng lệnh là lợi thế nhưng không bắt buộc.
Đối tượng tham gia:
Chuyên viên IT, quản trị hệ thống, và kỹ sư mạng muốn nâng cao kiến thức về Linux.

courses.title: Learn Python for Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking
courses.bio: Master Python for cybersecurity tasks like automation, log analysis, threat detection & building security tools.
objectives: Understand how Python is used in real-world cybersecurity tasks, including automation, scripting, and threat intelligence collection.
Build and automate cybersecurity tools using Python for tasks like log analysis, file monitoring, and network scanning.
Perform web scraping and interact with APIs to collect and process threat intelligence data efficiently
Analyze and visualize large security datasets using Python libraries and scripting techniques.
Create secure, modular, and well-documented Python code using best practices for error handling and robust design.
Develop a complete capstone cybersecurity project combining Python skills in networking, data analysis, and automation.

Introduction to Python for Cybersecurity: 1.5 Running python program via Interactive mode and via Script mode
Python Fundamentals: 2.2 Variables and Data Types in Python
2.3 Conditional Statements in Python (if, elif, else)
Data Structures and Basic Algorithms: 3.2 List Comprehension and Basic Manipulation in Python
3.3 String slicing, formatting, and built-in string methods
File Handling, Data Parsing, and Log Ana: 4.1 Reading and Writing files in Python
4.2 Handling file exceptions and ensuring data integrity
4.4 Processing Data from Structured and Unstructured Sources
4.5 Techniques for Parsing and Analyzing log files
Networking and Socket Programming: 5.4 Data Transmission over TCP IP Model
5.5 Creating a Basic Client and Server
5.6 Developing scripts to perform simple network operations
5.7 Simulating basic network scans and status checks
Automation and Scripting for Cybersecuri: 6.1 Writing scripts to automate file management, data extraction, and system mon
6.2 Scheduling and Executing Automated Tasks for Routine Security Checks
6.3 Parsing command-line arguments and designing user-friendly scripts
Web Scraping and Data Collection for Thr: 7.2 Legal and ethical considerations in data collection
7.3 Writing scripts to fetch and parse web pages
7.4 Extracting threat intelligence from web and API sources
7.5 Storing scraped data for the further analysis
Interacting with APIs and Cyber Threat I: 8.5 Aggregating Data from Multiple Sources for Threat Intelligence
Advanced Python Techniques for Cybersecu: 9.1 Introduction to Multithreading and Asynchronous Programming
9.2 Using Multithreading and Asynchronous Programming to improve Cyber Security
9.3 Using ThreadPoolExecutor for efficient thread management
9.4 Advance Error Handling, Logging and Debugging in Python
9.5 Combining networking, file handling, and data analysis techniques
9.7 Case studies on automating complex cybersecurity workflows
9.8 What is SDLC and SSDLC , and its various Models

requirements: No prior cybersecurity or programming experience required – this course is beginner-friendly and designed for all skill levels.
Basic computer literacy – familiarity with using a computer, browsing files, and installing software.
A working computer (Windows, macOS, or Linux) – with internet access to install Python and run scripts.
Willingness to learn and explore Python through practical, hands-on exercises and real-world cybersecurity examples.
courses.description:
Python for Cybersecurity: The Complete Beginner to Advanced Guide
In today’s digital world, cybersecurity threats are more complex and widespread than ever. Organizations of all sizes are looking for professionals who not only understand security fundamentals but can also automate, detect, and respond to threats efficiently using modern tools. One of the most powerful and flexible tools in a cybersecurity expert’s arsenal is Python.

Welcome to "Python for Cybersecurity" — a comprehensive, step-by-step course designed to take you from the basics of Python programming to building real-world cybersecurity tools. Whether you’re a complete beginner, a computer science student, a budding ethical hacker, or an IT professional looking to transition into cybersecurity, this course will help you develop the technical skills you need.

Why Learn Python for Cybersecurity?
Python is one of the most widely used programming languages in the cybersecurity field because it’s powerful, easy to learn, and incredibly versatile. From automation scripts to malware analysis, network scanning to threat intelligence — Python is everywhere in cybersecurity.
In this course, you’ll not only learn Python from the ground up, but also how to apply your skills in real-world cybersecurity scenarios. We cover everything from writing basic scripts to building full-fledged tools that can analyze logs, scan networks, interact with APIs, and collect threat intelligence data from the web.


What You’ll Learn
By the end of this course, you'll be able to:
Write clean and efficient Python scripts to automate cybersecurity tasks.
Analyze log files and network data to identify patterns, threats, and anomalies.
Create your own cybersecurity tools such as log analyzers, file scanners, and port scanners.
Scrape websites for threat intelligence, process data, and filter relevant information.
Interact with REST APIs to pull data from cyber threat intelligence feeds.
Visualize and interpret data to support security decisions.
Use Python modules and libraries like socket, re, requests, and pandas to perform real-world tasks.
Work on a capstone project that demonstrates your ability to solve complex problems using Python in cybersecurity.

Course Overview – What’s Inside?
The course is divided into 13 practical modules, each building on the last:
Module 1: Introduction to Python for Cybersecurity
Set up your Python environment, explore IDEs like VS Code, and understand how Python works behind the scenes.
Module 2: Python Fundamentals
Master variables, data types, operators, loops, conditions, functions, and modular programming.
Module 3: Data Structures & Algorithms
Work with lists, strings, searches (DFS, BFS, binary search), and advanced sorting techniques.
Module 4: File Handling & Log Analysis
Learn file I/O, handle exceptions, parse structured/unstructured data, and analyze logs using regular expressions.
Module 5: Networking & Socket Programming
Understand TCP/IP, OSI model, the client-server model, and build scripts for simple network scans.
Module 6: Automation & Scripting
Write scripts to automate file management, monitoring, logging, and routine security checks.
Module 7: Web Scraping for Threat Intelligence
Learn ethical scraping, parse web pages, extract cyber threat data, and store it for analysis.
Module 8: Working with APIs
Build Python API clients, interact with REST APIs, and aggregate threat intelligence from multiple sources.
Module 9: Advanced Python Techniques
Use multithreading, async programming, advanced error handling, and logging to write secure, efficient code. Explore how to integrate networking, file handling, and data analysis in one script — plus, learn about SDLC and SSDLC models.
Modules 10–12: Real-World Projects
Project 1: Build a custom reconnaissance tool step by step.
Project 2: Develop a password hash cracker.
Project 3: Create a network scanner using Nmap — including installation, scanning, and reporting.
Module 13: Tips & Career Guidance
Learn practical brute-force methods, reporting, testing, receiving feedback, and explore future career paths in cybersecurity where Python skills are essential.


Who Is This Course For?
This course is perfect for:
Beginners who want to enter the cybersecurity field with no coding background.
Students and IT professionals who want to automate security tasks using Python.
Ethical hackers and bug bounty hunters who need to create custom tools.
Cybersecurity analysts and SOC professionals looking to boost their scripting skills.
Anyone preparing for certifications like CEH, CompTIA Security+, or OSCP.


Requirements or Prerequisites
No prior coding experience required — we teach you from scratch.
A laptop or desktop with internet access.
Curiosity to learn and explore how Python powers modern cybersecurity.
(Optional) Some basic understanding of networking or operating systems is helpful but not mandatory.


What Makes This Course Unique?
Project-Based Learning: Build real tools, not just write code.
Security-Focused: Every topic is framed within a cybersecurity context.
Beginner-Friendly Approach: No jargon, no confusion — just clear explanations.
Industry-Relevant Skills: Learn how to use Python the way security professionals use it in real jobs.
Certificate of Completion: Showcase your skills with a certificate upon finishing the course.
Start Building Your Career in Cybersecurity
The demand for cybersecurity professionals with automation and scripting skills is growing every day. Python is the gateway to many high-paying, impactful roles in this field. By completing this course, you’ll not only be ready to contribute meaningfully to cybersecurity teams, but you’ll also have the confidence to build tools and solve problems on your own.
Don’t wait for the future — build it with Python today.
Enrol now and take your first step toward becoming a cybersecurity expert with Python.
target_audience: Beginners in Cybersecurity who want to start their journey by learning how to use Python to automate tasks, analyze logs, and build security tools.
Aspiring Ethical Hackers and Penetration Testers looking to enhance their scripting skills for offensive and defensive security.
IT Professionals and System Administrators who want to automate security operations, analyze network traffic, or write custom scripts to strengthen system security.
Computer Science and Engineering Students seeking hands-on experience in applying Python for real-world cybersecurity tasks and projects.
Tech Enthusiasts and Self-Learners who are curious about cybersecurity and want to learn practical Python programming without prior experience.

courses.title: Wireshark威胁狩猎 - 探测网络流量的秘密
courses.bio: 小白也能掌握的Wireshark课程
objectives: 学会Wireshark工具的使用
使用Wireshark分析网络流量
使用Wireshark进行威胁狩猎
熟悉常见的网络攻击
requirements: 无需编程经验，您会学习到课程所有的知识
courses.description:
Wireshark是一个开源的网络封包分析软件，它可以在多个操作系统上运行，包括Windows、macOS和Linux。Wireshark允许用户捕获和分析网络数据包，以便深入了解网络通信的细节和问题。
Wireshark的主要功能如下：
封包捕获：Wireshark可以捕获网络接口上的数据包，并将其保存为捕获文件，供后续分析使用。它支持多种网络接口类型，如以太网、无线网络、USB等。
封包分析：一旦捕获了网络数据包，Wireshark可以对其进行深入的分析。它提供了强大的过滤和搜索功能，可以根据协议、源或目的地址、端口号等条件过滤数据包。此外，Wireshark可以对数据包进行解码，将它们转换为易于理解的格式，并显示各个协议层的详细信息。
统计和报告：Wireshark可以生成各种统计数据和报告，帮助用户分析网络流量模式、识别异常情况和排查网络问题。它可以提供关于数据包数量、协议使用情况、网络延迟、吞吐量等方面的统计信息。
支持多种协议：Wireshark支持众多的网络协议，包括常见的以太网、TCP/IP、UDP、HTTP、DNS、FTP等。它能够解析和显示这些协议的详细信息，帮助用户理解网络通信的工作原理和流程。
扩展性：Wireshark具有强大的扩展性，用户可以根据自己的需求编写自定义的插件和脚本，以增强软件的功能和灵活性。
Wireshark广泛用于网络管理、网络安全、网络开发和故障排除等领域。它可以帮助管理员监控和分析网络流量，识别潜在的安全问题或性能瓶颈，以及调试网络应用程序和协议。同时，Wireshark也是学习网络通信和协议的重要工具，可以帮助用户深入了解网络技术的细节。
target_audience: 对网络安全感兴趣的人员

courses.title: احترف Metasploit: دليلك العملي لاختبار الاختراق خطوة بخطوة
courses.bio: تعلم Metasploit وEthical Hacking عبر اختراق ويندوز ولينكس، رفع الصلاحيات، والتحكم بجهاز الضحية عمليًا.
objectives: سنتعرف على ما هي أداة Metasploit، ولماذا تُعد الخيار الأول لدى المختصين في الأمن السيبراني.
سنتناول مكونات Metasploit الرئيسية وكيفية تشغيل قاعدة البيانات.
اختراق نظام التشغيل لينكس و نظام النشغليل ويندوز.
بناء وتشفير الفيروسات وارسالها لجهاز الضحية.
التحكم الكامل بجهاز الضحية كيفية رفع الصلاحيات.
اختراق خادم Active Directory والتحكم بالمستخدمين والأجهزة المرتبطة بالشبكة.

إخفاء الفايروس ضمن برامج أصلية ومسموحة: إخفاء الفايروس ضمن برامج أصلية ومسموحة

requirements: معرفة اساسيات أنظمة التشغيل كالي, ويندوز , VMware.
courses.description:
هل ترغب في الدخول إلى عالم اختبار الاختراق الأخلاقي من أوسع أبوابه؟ هل سمعت عن أداة Metasploit وتتساءل كيف يمكن استخدامها لاختراق الأنظمة واكتشاف الثغرات بشكل احترافي؟ هذه الدورة صممت خصيصًا لك!
في هذه الدورة العملية، ستتعلم كيفية استخدام منصة Metasploit، وهي واحدة من أقوى وأشهر أدوات اختبار الاختراق في العالم، يستخدمها المحترفون في مجالات الأمن السيبراني، اختبار الأنظمة، والتحقيق الجنائي الرقمي.
ستبدأ الدورة من الأساسيات، مثل:
- إعداد بيئة اختبار وهمية آمنة.
- التعرف على واجهة الأداة ومكوناتها الأساسية.
- تشغيل قاعدة البيانات وربطها بالأداة.

ثم ننتقل إلى الجانب العملي، حيث ستتعلم:
- جمع المعلومات عن الشبكة والانظمة.
- اختراق أنظمة لينكس وويندوز باستخدام ثغرات حقيقية.
- بناء وتشفير فايروسات مخصصة لتجاوز الحماية.
- التحكم الكامل بجهاز الضحية باستخدام جلسات Meterpreter.
- رفع الصلاحيات للحصول على صلاحيات المدير.
- اختراق خادم Active Directory.
- استخراج كلمات المرور وشهادات التشفير من الأنظمة.
تم إعداد هذه الدورة بأسلوب تطبيقي خطوة بخطوة، مدعوم بأمثلة واقعية وتمارين عملية تساعدك على فهم المفاهيم واكتساب المهارات المطلوبة لسوق العمل، مع التركيز على محاكاة سيناريوهات حقيقية يستخدمها خبراء الأمن السيبراني، بالإضافة إلى توضيح الأدوات المساعدة وكيفية تحليل النتائج، مما يضمن تجربة تعليمية متكاملة وعميقة تُعزز من قدرتك على التعامل مع التحديات الأمنية المعقدة بثقة واحتراف.
انضم الآن وابدأ رحلتك نحو احتراف اختبار الاختراق باستخدام Metasploit، مع مدرب معتمد وصاحب خبرة طويلة في المجال!
target_audience: للمبتدئين والمحترفين في مجال الاختراق الاخلاقي للانظمة والشبكات.

Performance Evaluation and Control: Methods to assess cybersecurity performance using metrics and tools like Nessus and FraudGuard, and maintain oversight to mi
Continuous Improvement: How to gather feedback, analyze results, and apply ongoing improvements to cybersecurity strategies, with tools like Burp Suite for enha
Students will also explore applying these concepts across various management fields, including marketing, quality, sales, projects, HR, and finance, ensuring a

requirements: there are minimal requirements or prerequisites to ensure accessibility for all learners. The following are recommended:
Basic Understanding of Management Concepts: A general awareness of planning, organizing, or leading a team is helpful but not mandatory, as the course covers these from the ground up.
Elementary Knowledge of Cybersecurity: Familiarity with basic terms like phishing or data protection is a plus, though the course starts with fundamentals for beginners.
Access to a Computer or Laptop: A device with internet access is required to view video lessons and download supplementary materials like PDF summaries.
Eagerness to Learn: The primary requirement is your motivation to enhance your skills in cybersecurity management, and I’ll guide you step-by-step.

Note for Beginners: No prior experience is necessary! This course is designed for managers, IT professionals, beginners, and anyone interested in security awareness. Whether you’re new to the field or looking to refine your expertise, all you need is dedication, and I’ll support you throughout your learning journey.
courses.description: هل تطمح إلى حماية مؤسستك من التهديدات السيبرانية المتزايدة باستخدام استراتيجيات إدارية متميزة وحديثة؟ انضم إلى كورس "إدارة الأمن السيبراني" الشامل الذي يقدم لك كل ما تحتاجه لتصبح قائدًا متميزًا في هذا المجال! سواء كنت مديرًا يسعى لقيادة فريقه نحو بيئة عمل آمنة، أو موظفًا في تكنولوجيا المعلومات يرغب في تطوير مهاراته الإدارية، أو مبتدئًا يطمح لخوض غمار الأمن السيبراني من الصفر، أو حتى فردًا مهتمًا بتعزيز الوعي الأمني في مجاله، فإن هذا الكورس مصمم خصيصًا لتلبية احتياجاتك. يغطي الكورس المفاهيم الإدارية الأساسية مثل التخطيط الأمني الاستراتيجي، التنظيم الفعال، التوجيه القيادي، التحفيز لضمان الالتزام، الرقابة الدقيقة، التطوير المستمر، والقيادة الإدارية الشاملة، مع تطبيقات عملية على إدارة التسويق، الجودة، المبيعات، المشاريع، الموارد البشرية، والمالية. ستتعلم كيفية تقييم الأداء باستخدام مقاييس حديثة، جمع التغذية الراجعة من فريقك وأنظمته، وتطبيق التحسينات المستمرة بمساعدة أدوات متقدمة مثل Nessus لفحص الثغرات، وFraudGuard لكشف الاحتيال، وبburp Suite لتحليل الأمان. من خلال دروس فيديو واضحة، أمثلة واقعية مستمدة من سيناريوهات عملية، وملفات مرجعية قابلة للتحميل مثل ملخصات السلايدات ودلائل إضافية، ستكتسب مهارات يمكنك تطبيقها فورًا في بيئة عملك. سواء كنت ترغب في حماية بيانات عملائك من التصيد الإلكتروني، أو تحسين أداء أنظمة المؤسسة، أو تدريب فريقك على المعايير الأمنية، فإن هذا الكورس سيمنحك الثقة والكفاءة اللازمتين. انضم إلينا الآن لتكون في صدارة مواجهة التحديات السيبرانية وتبني مستقبلًا آمنًا لمؤسستك!
target_audience: is designed for a diverse group of learners who will find its content valuable. It is ideal for:
Managers and Team Leaders: Those leading organizations or teams who aim to protect their institutions from cyber threats like data breaches and phishing through effective managerial strategies.
IT Professionals and Cybersecurity Specialists: Employees in technology or security roles seeking to enhance their administrative skills and integrate them with cybersecurity practices.
Beginners Interested in Cybersecurity: Individuals new to the field who want to build a strong foundation in managing security from scratch.
Professionals Across Other Fields: Anyone in marketing, sales, quality management, project management, HR, or finance looking to strengthen security awareness and apply it in their daily work.

Note: The course suits all levels—beginners, intermediates, and experts—provided you are eager to learn and grow in cybersecurity management. Whether you’re safeguarding your organization, advancing your career, or boosting your team’s security culture

requirements: Basic Electrical Engineering and network
courses.description:
Course Overview:
You’re taking a CCTV course focused on closed-circuit television systems.
The course covers light current topics, including electrical, communication, and network aspects.
Understanding the Basics:
You’ll start by assembling knowledge about surveillance camera systems.
Learning about the fundamental components of these systems is crucial.
Camera Types:
Before diving into specific camera types, you’ll explore how cameras work and understand the overall system.
Consider factors like multiple sharing and sharing sources when choosing cameras.
Recording Devices:
You’ll delve into the details of recording devices, such as DVRs (Digital Video Recorders) and NVRs.
Each type has unique features, and you’ll learn how to select the right one for your needs.
Cabling Considerations:
Understanding cable types is essential for connecting recording devices to cameras.
Different cables serve different purposes, so you’ll explore their differences and choose wisely.
Connectors:
Connectors play a vital role in ensuring proper connections between components.
You’ll learn about connector types and their practical applications.
Designing a System:
Armed with knowledge about cameras, recording devices, cables, and connectors, you’ll be ready to design surveillance systems.
If someone asks you to work on a project, you’ll follow these steps to create an effective system.
Remember, practical experience and hands-on practice will enhance your understanding. Good luck with your course, and feel free to ask if you have any specific questions!

courses.title: Cisco Secure Workload (Tetration)
courses.bio: Para estudantes, iniciantes ou profissionais - Aprenda microssegmentação de Workloads
objectives: O que é um Workload
A superfície de ataques atual e os principais desafios
Casos de uso do Cisco Secure Workload (Tetration)
O que é microssegmentação, como implementá-la e os tipos de deploy
O que são labels, escopos e queries no Cisco Secure Workload
O que é Application Dependency Mapping para descoberta automática de polícicas
Análise e enforcement de políticas
Sistemas suportados
Detecção e proteção de vulnerabilidades
Demonstração completa da plataforma
Demo real de um ransomware - Casos de uso com e sem microssgmentação

Cisco Secure Workload (Tetration): Identidade - integração com ISE e Secure Client
Instalação e configuração do agente (Inclui apresentações)

requirements: Conhecimentos básicos de redes
courses.description:
ATENÇÃO: Esse treinamento é o mesmo que consta no curso "Formação em Cibersegurança Cisco - Network Security Parte 1" que possui 3 soluções - Firepower, Meraki e Tetration - e está em promoção por tempo limitado.


Objetivo: curso completo - inclui apresentações, demonstrações e laboratórios - com foco no dia-a-dia, para você desenvolver habilidades que te impulsionem rápido na carreira.
Você vai obter conhecimentos para arquitetar e implementar projetos de microssegmentação de workloads.


Público:  estudantes, profissionais em início de carreira ou com experiência, que já trabalham ou estão em busca de novas oportunidades nas áreas de pré-vendas, pós-vendas ou como cliente final.


Conteúdo:


Cisco Secure Workload (Tetration)
O que é um workload

courses.title: Ethical hacking: Metasploit framework
courses.bio: "Mastering Cybersecurity Assessments: Unleashing the Power of Metasploit
objectives: Learn how to make malicious files to hack almost any device
Learn Metasploit framework from A to Z
get familiar with all Metasploit modules
get prepared for ethical hacking
requirements: No previous experience needed
courses.description:
Welcome to the ultimate journey into cybersecurity assessment mastery with our comprehensive Udemy course on Metasploit. Whether you're a novice looking to break into the world of ethical hacking or a seasoned cybersecurity professional aiming to sharpen your skills, this course offers a deep dive into the arsenal of tools and techniques that Metasploit provides.
Embark on a transformative learning experience as you uncover the inner workings of penetration testing, a crucial component of modern cybersecurity practices. Through a meticulously crafted curriculum, we guide you step-by-step through Metasploit's vast array of capabilities, empowering you to identify vulnerabilities, exploit weaknesses, and fortify systems against potential threats.
Prepare to immerse yourself in a hands-on learning environment, where theory meets practice in a series of engaging exercises and real-world simulations. From reconnaissance and information gathering to exploit development and post-exploitation tactics, you'll gain invaluable experience in every facet of the penetration testing lifecycle.
At the heart of this course lies Metasploit's user-friendly interface, designed to streamline the process of conducting security assessments while providing unparalleled flexibility and customization. Navigate with confidence through its modular architecture and tap into its extensive repository of exploits and payloads, enabling you to tailor your approach to each unique scenario.
But this course goes beyond mere technical proficiency; it instills in you a deep understanding of the ethical considerations and legal frameworks that govern cybersecurity assessments. By emphasizing the importance of responsible and ethical hacking practices, we empower you to harness Metasploit's power for positive impact while upholding the highest standards of integrity and professionalism.
Join us on this transformative journey and emerge as a certified cybersecurity expert, equipped with the knowledge, skills, and ethical framework needed to safeguard digital assets and defend against emerging threats in an ever-evolving cyber landscape.
target_audience: cyber security engineers and penetration testers

courses.description:
Vous souhaitez devenir Administrateur FortiAnalyzer 7.4 et préparer efficacement la certification Fortinet FCP ?
Ce cours complet et pratique est fait pour vous.
FortiAnalyzer est un composant essentiel de l’écosystème Fortinet. Il permet de centraliser, analyser et exploiter les journaux de sécurité afin de renforcer la visibilité et la conformité de votre réseau.
Dans ce programme, nous allons explorer pas à pas toutes les fonctionnalités clés de l’administration FortiAnalyzer, à travers des explications claires, des démonstrations pratiques et des cas d’usage réels.
À l’issue de ce cours, vous serez capable de :
Comprendre le rôle et les caractéristiques de FortiAnalyzer dans l’architecture Fortinet.
Administrer et sécuriser l’accès aux consoles et aux comptes administrateurs.
Gérer les ADOMs (Administrative Domains) et organiser vos environnements.
Configurer et surveiller les appareils enregistrés.
Collecter, stocker et analyser les journaux de sécurité (logs).
Générer des rapports prédéfinis et personnalisés pour la conformité et l’audit.
Appliquer les bonnes pratiques d’administration recommandées par Fortinet.
Vous préparez à l’examen de certification Fortinet FCP – FortiAnalyzer Administrator.
Ce que vous trouverez dans ce cours :
Des explications claires et structurées adaptées aux débutants comme aux professionnels.
Des labs pratiques pour vous exercer dans des scénarios proches de la réalité.
Des quiz pour tester vos connaissances.
Des cas d’application concrets pour mieux comprendre l’usage de FortiAnalyzer en entreprise.
Public cible :
Administrateurs réseaux et sécurité souhaitant renforcer leurs compétences Fortinet.
Ingénieurs sécurité en charge de la gestion et de l’audit des logs.
Étudiants ou professionnels préparant la certification Fortinet FCP – FortiAnalyzer Administrator.
Toute personne désirant mieux comprendre l’écosystème Fortinet et la gestion centralisée des logs.
Rejoignez le cours dès aujourd’hui et devenez un admin FortiAnalyzer 7.4 prêt à réussir la certification FCP !

courses.title: REDES Y COMUNICACIONES
courses.bio: Simulación y análisis de redes TCP/IP con Cisco Packet Tracer, protocolos clave y prácticas esenciales.
objectives: Conocerás cómo operan las redes TCP/IP, incluyendo Internet, a través de ejercicios prácticos.
Aprenderás a emplear herramientas de análisis como sniffers para observar y entender la información que circula en la red.
Pondrás en práctica herramientas especializadas para gestionar, inspeccionar y resolver problemas de tráfico en la red.
Explora y domina redes informáticas con Cisco Packet Tracer

IPV6 DIRECCIONAMIENTO Y SUBREDES SUB RED: IPV6 DIRECCIONAMIENTO Y SUBREDES SUB RED VLSM
IPV6 DIRECCIONAMIENTO Y SUBREDES SUB RED VLSM II
ENRUTAMIENTO DE ROUTERS CON IP V6: ENRUTAMIENTO DE ROUTERS CON IP V6 I

requirements: Conocimientos básicos de Internet
Conocimientos básicos de sistemas operativos
courses.description:
Este curso está diseñado para quienes desean comprender el funcionamiento de las redes de datos desde una perspectiva práctica y aplicada. A lo largo de las clases, se explorarán los fundamentos de redes TCP/IP, abarcando temas esenciales como direccionamiento IP, subredes, protocolos de comunicación, estructura de paquetes y análisis de tráfico de red en diferentes entornos operativos.
Utilizando Cisco Packet Tracer, una herramienta gratuita y ampliamente reconocida en el ámbito académico y profesional, el estudiante podrá simular escenarios reales sin necesidad de hardware adicional o costoso. Se trabajará con configuraciones de routers, switches, asignación de direcciones IP, creación de topologías de red, comandos de prueba, monitoreo de tráfico mediante sniffers y herramientas de diagnóstico para verificar la conectividad.
El curso se imparte paso a paso, pensando tanto en principiantes como en quienes deseen reforzar conocimientos previos. Aprenderás a configurar redes en sistemas operativos como GNU/Linux, explorar el comportamiento de protocolos como ARP, ICMP, TCP y UDP, e interpretar capturas de paquetes para identificar problemas comunes o validar configuraciones técnicas.
Al finalizar, contarás con la base necesaria para desenvolverte con mayor seguridad en entornos de redes, así como para avanzar hacia certificaciones como Cisco CCNA. Si buscas una formación sólida, accesible y orientada a la práctica real en redes, ¡este curso es para ti!
target_audience: Desarrolladores Informaticos y publico en general
Ganas de aprender :-)

Integração do Guacamole com o AD

requirements: Conhecimento básico de Redes de Computadores, Cloud e firewall.
courses.description:
Neste curso, vamos criar um projeto onde você aprenderá a implementar um firewall pfSense na Oracle Cloud, criando uma solução de segurança robusta e escalável para proteger sua infraestrutura em nuvem. O pfSense é uma poderosa plataforma de firewall de código aberto amplamente utilizada para gerenciar redes e proteger contra ameaças.
O que você aprenderá:
Criação e Configuração da VCN na Oracle Cloud: Passo a passo para criar uma VCN na Oracle Cloud e configurá-la para acesso a rede.
Criação e Configuração da Instância na Oracle Cloud: Passo a passo para criar uma instância na Oracle Cloud e configurá-la para hospedar o pfSense.
Criação e Configuração do PFSENSE na Oracle Cloud: Passo a passo para criar uma instância do PFSENSE na Oracle Cloud e configurá-la como firewall da rede.
Implementação de OpenVPN: Aprenda a configurar uma VPN segura com OpenVPN no pfSense para acesso remoto seguro à sua rede.
Configuração de Docker: Implementação e gerenciamento de containers Docker no ambiente Oracle Cloud, utilizando o pfSense para segmentação e segurança.
Acesso Remoto com Guacamole: Configure o Apache Guacamole para acesso remoto aos seus servidores e aplicações de forma segura através de um navegador web.


Para quem é este curso:
Administradores de rede que desejam melhorar a segurança de suas infraestruturas na nuvem.
Profissionais de TI interessados em aprender sobre segurança de rede usando pfSense.
Entusiastas da segurança da informação que desejam expandir seus conhecimentos práticos.
target_audience: Administradores de Redes e Sistemas

requirements: 了解VMware vSphere ESXi 7虚拟化
courses.description:
VMware vSphere ESXi 是运行在裸机之上，专为运行虚拟机、最大限度降低配置要求和简化部署而设计的一套虚拟化系统，它是业界领先的高效体系架构，在可靠性、性能和支持方面树立了行业标杆。ESXi 可将多台服务器整合到较少物理设备中，从而减少对空间、电力和 IT 管理的要求，同时提升性能。尽管 ESXi 占用空间仅为 150 MB，却可实现非常多的功能，同时还能最大限度地降低 Hypervisor 的安全风险。虚拟机配置最高可达 128 个虚拟 CPU、6 TB 的 RAM 和 120 台设备，可以满足大部分场合的应用需求。


本课程基于VMware vSphere ESXi 7讲解了虚拟化环境的搭建，包括但不限于基于虚拟化的操作系统安装、虚拟化"硬件"的配置、虚拟化"网络"的搭建等方面内容。如同赵老师其他课程一样，录制的视频在后期进行了大量的剪辑工作（剪掉超过50%视频时长），在不失操作连贯性的情况下，剪掉了可有可无的讲解内容，对一些耗时等待的操作进行了"快进"处理，尽可能节省学员的学习时间成本，力求让学员在较短的时间内掌握该软件的使用。
target_audience: IT运维人员
软件开发人员
软件测试人员

courses.description:
Découvrez comment configurer des analyses avancées sur les caméras AcuSense et intégrer des alertes dans HikCentral pour une surveillance plus efficace. Dans ce cours pratique, vous découvrirez comment optimiser la sécurité avec une détection intelligente des personnes et des véhicules, créer des événements automatisés tels que : Franchissement de ligne, Intrusion, Détention d'entrée et de sortie dans la région, entre autres, et personnaliser les notifications en temps réel. Idéal pour les techniciens, installateurs et professionnels de la sécurité électronique qui souhaitent améliorer leurs compétences et proposer des solutions plus avancées sur le marché de la vidéosurveillance.


Vous verrez, étape par étape, comment ajuster les paramètres d'intelligence artificielle sur les caméras AcuSense, améliorant la précision des détections et réduisant les fausses alarmes. De plus, vous apprendrez à intégrer ces fonctions dans HikCentral, garantissant ainsi une gestion de la surveillance centralisée et efficace.


Grâce à des exemples pratiques, des démonstrations détaillées et des explications simples, vous quitterez ce cours avec les connaissances dont vous avez besoin pour mettre en œuvre des systèmes de sécurité intelligents et personnalisables. Peu importe que vous ayez déjà de l'expérience ou que vous débutiez dans le domaine, ce cours vous guidera de manière claire et objective.


À la fin, vous serez en mesure de configurer et d'optimiser les systèmes de surveillance de manière professionnelle, ajoutant plus de valeur à votre travail et offrant une plus grande sécurité à vos clients, entreprises et projets personnels. Inscrivez-vous maintenant et faites passer vos compétences au niveau supérieur !
target_audience: Installateurs et techniciens de vidéosurveillance – Professionnels qui souhaitent améliorer leurs compétences en matière de surveillance intelligente.

Débutants en vidéosurveillance – Personnes qui souhaitent apprendre à configurer les analyses et les alertes de manière pratique et efficace.

courses.title: Microsoft Defender XDR Workshop für IT-Administratoren
courses.bio: Praxisleitfaden für Microsoft Defender: Einrichtung, Sicherheit & Bedrohungserkennung
objectives: Verstehst die Architektur von Microsoft Defender XDR und wie alles zusammenspielt.
Kannst grundlegende Einstellungen in Defender XDR selbstständig konfigurieren.
Weißt, wie du Bedrohungen mit Defender for Endpoint und Office 365 erkennst und reagierst.
Nutzst Cloud Apps effektiv zur Überwachung und Absicherung deiner Cloud-Umgebung.

Microsoft Defender XDR: 6. Microsoft Defender XDR - Defender for Identity Teil 3
Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Investigations, Explorer, Review & Attack Simulation Training

requirements: Grundkenntnisse in Microsoft 365, Zugang zu einer Microsoft 365 Test- oder Live-Umgebung, Basiswissen zu IT-Sicherheit und Compliance, erste Erfahrung mit Azure AD von Vorteil
courses.description:
Dieser praxisorientierte Workshop richtet sich an IT-Administratoren, die Microsoft Defender XDR effizient und sicher in ihrer Organisation bereitstellen wollen. Ich konzentriere mich auf Sicherheitskonzepte, die Integration in bestehende Microsoft 365 Workloads und die gezielte Anwendung der Defender-Tools in realen Geschäftsszenarien. Ich kombiniere theoretische Grundlagen mit praktischen Übungen direkt in den Microsoft 365 Admin-Centern, um dir das nötige Know-how für Planung, Konfiguration und Verwaltung von Defender-Lösungen zu vermitteln.


Wichtige Inhalte meines Workshops:


Technische Architektur von Microsoft Defender XDR und Zusammenspiel der einzelnen Komponenten
Sichere Basiskonfiguration von Defender für Endpoint, Identity & Office 365
Integration von Conditional Access, MFA und Geräteschutz in deine Sicherheitsstrategie
Analyse und Umgang mit Sicherheitsvorfällen mit Incidents & Alerts
Monitoring von Cloud-Anwendungen mit Defender for Cloud Apps
Best Practices für Richtlinienmanagement, Bedrohungserkennung und Schutzmaßnahmen
In diesem intensiven Admin-Workshop gebe ich dir tiefe Einblicke in die Funktionen und das Zusammenspiel der verschiedenen Microsoft Defender-Module – mit starkem Praxisfokus und klarem Augenmerk auf Sicherheit, Automatisierung und Compliance. Ziel ist es, dir zu zeigen, wie du eine ganzheitliche Sicherheitsstrategie für deine Microsoft 365 Umgebung mit Defender XDR entwickelst und umsetzt.
Ein besonderer Fokus liegt auf dem Schutz von Identitäten, Endpunkten, E-Mails und Cloud-Diensten. Ich zeige dir, wie du Risiken frühzeitig erkennst, Angriffsflächen reduzierst und Schutzmaßnahmen automatisierst – inklusive Troubleshooting-Tipps und Strategien zur Optimierung deiner Sicherheitsumgebung.
Auch Aspekte wie Nutzerakzeptanz, Awareness-Strategien und die praktische Umsetzung von Sicherheitsrichtlinien werden behandelt. Du bekommst konkrete Umsetzungstipps und Checklisten für den direkten Einsatz in deinem Arbeitsalltag.


Voraussetzungen:
Du solltest Grundkenntnisse in der Microsoft 365 Administration sowie etwas Erfahrung mit Entra ID (ehemals Azure AD) und Sicherheitskonzepten im Cloud-Umfeld mitbringen. Dieser Kurs ist geeignet für IT-Profis ebenso wie für ambitionierte Admins, die neu bei Microsoft Defender XDR sind.
Dieser Workshop ist ideal für:


Microsoft 365 Administratoren
IT-Sicherheits- und Compliance-Beauftragte
Endpoint-, SharePoint- und Teams-Admins
IT-Projektleiter im Bereich Cloud & Modern Workplace
Nach Abschluss des Kurses hast du das Wissen, um Microsoft Defender XDR in deiner Organisation effektiv zu implementieren, abzusichern und weiterzuentwickeln. Du erhältst ein Teilnahmezertifikat, umfassende Schulungsunterlagen und praktische Vorlagen für deinen Arbeitsalltag.
target_audience: IT-Administratoren, Security-Verantwortliche und M365-Admins, die Microsoft Defender professionell einrichten, nutzen und ihre Umgebung absichern wollen.

ネットワークセキュリティ基礎－イントラネットのセキュリティを高めるための具体的なアドバイス
クラウドセキュリティ基礎－クラウドを守るためのアクセス制御
クラウドセキュリティ基礎－クラウドを守るためのセキュリティアーキテクチャ
クラウドセキュリティ基礎－クラウドストレージを活用したバックアップ
システムアドミン基礎－アカウント管理（アクセス制御）
システムアドミン基礎－パッチ・アップデート管理

requirements: 情報システム担当者としての基礎的なITの専門知識と実務経験
セキュリティ実務に関する知識や経験は必要ありません
「直感的にわかる！経営者と一般ユーザーのためのサイバーセキュリティ入門」の受講をおすすめ
courses.description:
この講座は「直感的にわかる！経営者と一般ユーザーのためのサイバーセキュリティ入門」の続編で、


よりテクニカルで専門的な観点から、情報システム部門で実務を担当されている方がサイバーセキュリティの本質と全体像をより深く理解できるように構成しており、


セキュリティ実務、ネットワークセキュリティ、クラウドセキュリティ、システムアドミンなどの分野で実務で使える専門知識だけではなく、セキュリティリーダーとして組織のサイバーセキュリティ強化を主導するノウハウを身につけることができます。


加えてゼロトラストネットワークやSASEといった世界のセキュリティ対策のトレンドも把握することができます。


この講座はベンダーから中立な立場で作成しているため、この講座を学ぶことでご自身の組織にあったソリューションを選ぶことができるようになります。


日々の業務でとても忙しい皆さんがタイムパフォーマンスよく必要な内容を学べるよう、内容を吟味して、できる限り凝縮しました。


なお、この講座ではベンダー毎のセキュリティソリューションの特徴や詳しい実装方法については扱っておりません。予めご了承ください。
target_audience: 事業会社でサイバーセキュリティの実務を担当される方
中小規模の組織の情報システム担当の方
海外子会社のシステム部門の管理を担当されている方
サイバーセキュリティが取り扱う分野の広さと深さに迷子になっている方
忙しいので必要な知識を手っ取り早く得たいと考えている方
サイバーセキュリティのテクニカルで専門的な知識を得たい方

courses.description:
السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته
اهلا بكم في الدورة الكاملة  لصناعة البرمجيات الخبيثة بأستخدام بايثون
ليس المحترف من يعرف الثغرات و طرق استغلالها ولا حتي الادوات و طرق استخدامها بل المحترف هو من يعرف كيف يصنع ادواته بنفسه في هذا المجال لان من يبني أدواته بنفسه يستطيع ان يفصلها كما يشاء علي حسب استخدامه و احتياجه بل و يستطيع ان يطورها اكثر و يجعل ادواته اكثر تطور عن ادوات الاخرين و حديثة عنهم و لهذا انا هنا لكي اساعدك في هذا
ففي هذه الدورة سوف تتعلم كيف تبني أدواتك بنفسك و تطورها علي حسب احتياجك لها و تجعلها محدثة لكي تتناسب مع الوضع الحالي و التحديثات و التحديات الجديدة
و ايضا لن تتعلم كيف تبني ادواتك فحسب بل ستتعلم ما هي الفكرة لهذه الاداة و لماذا احتاجها و في ماذا سوف استخدامها و طريقة برمجتها و استخدامها و تطويرها لان من المهم ان تكون متقن لكل شيئ بها حتي تكون محترف و متحكم بكل الامكانيات المتاحة بها
و مع كل هذا لا تقلق فطريقة الشرح مبسطة و سلسة حتي لا يكون هناك شيئ صعب في الشرح و لن نكتفي بشرح الفكرة النظرية فقط بالطبع بل سنقوم بالتطبيق فهذه الدورة في الاساس هي دورة تطبيقية اي تعتمد علي التطبيق فسوف نشرح فكرة الاداة نظرياً بالتفصيل ثم ننتقل الي تطبيق الفكرة بالكود بأستخدام لغة البرمجة بايثون حتي نكون قد اتقنا تماماً الاداة سواء نظرياً او عملياً
أتمني أن تستمتعوا معي بهذه الرحلة الرائعة كما أستمتعت انا بتسجيلها وشرحها لكم و انا معكم دائما فمن كان لديه استفسار يمكن التواصل معي عن طريق الرسائل
شكرا لكم و أتمني لكم التوفيق :)

courses.title: TOR AĞI : Anonim Erişim ve Site Yayınlama
courses.bio: Deep Web kavramını öğrenme Dark Web de site yayınlama ve TOR ağını tanımaya hazırsanız bu kurs tamda size göre
objectives: Sanal Makine & Kali Linux – VirtualBox ile Kali Linux kurulumu ve temel ayarlar.
Web Sunucu Yönetimi – Apache sunucusu kurma ve yerel ağda site yayını.
Tor Ağı & Dark Web – Tor’un çalışma prensipleri, Onion siteleri ve VPN ilişkisi.
Anonimlik & Güvenlik – IP gizleme, trafik takibi önleme ve anonim ağlar.
Raspberry Pi ile Tor Sunucusu – Raspberry Pi kullanarak bir Tor sunucusu oluşturma.
Ngrok ile Port Açmadan Yayın – Ngrok kullanarak web sitenizi dış ağda yayınlama.
EXIF & Log Temizleme – Meta veri temizliği ile iz bırakmadan paylaşım yapma.
SSH & RDP Bağlantıları – Güvenli uzaktan erişim yöntemlerini öğrenme.
Onion Web Siteleri – Onion uzantılı web siteleri kurma ve yapılandırma.
Güvenlik ve Anonimlik Araçları – Tor tarayıcısı, VPN ve diğer anonimlik araçlarını kullanma.

GİRİŞ: EĞİTİM İLE ALAKALI BİLGİLENDİRME METNİ (KESİN OKU)
SANAL MAKİNA & İŞLETİM SİSTEMİ KURULUMU: KALI LINUX KLAVYEYİ KALICI TÜRKÇE YAPMA
TOR AĞI: NE DEĞİLDİR & NE AMAÇ İLE KULLANILIR (TOR)
TOR ARAÇLARININ KURULUMU & KULLANIMI: İŞLETİM SİSTEMİNİ TOR AĞINDA ANONİM OLMA
WEB SİTEYİ DIŞ AĞA AÇMA: PORT AÇMADAN SİTEYİ DIŞ AĞA AÇMA [NGROK]
RASPBERRY Pİ İLE TOR SUNUCUSU OLUŞTURMA: RASPBERRY Pİ SATIN ALABİLECEĞİNİZ E-TİCARET SİTELERİ
KALİ LİNUX RASPBERRY Pİ TEMEL AYARLAR
RASPBERRY Pİ KARTIMIZA SSH SERVİSİNİN KURULUMU & YAPILANDIRILMASI
STATİK IP ATAMASINDA HERHANGİ BİR PROBLEM OLUR İSE BU YÖNTEMİ DENEYİN
TOR SUNUCUSU İÇİN GEREKLİ PAKET PROGRAMLARIN KURULUMU & YAPILANDIRILMASI
SSH ANAHTAR İLE ERİŞİM (PUTTY KEY GENERATOR)
PUTTY KEY GENERATOR & PUTTY İNDİRME LİNKİ

requirements: Temel Bilgisayar Bilgisi ve yeterli düzeyde internete erişim
Raspberry Pi Kartı (İsteğe bağlı)
İlgi ve öğrenme motivasyonu dışında başka bir gereksinim bulunmamaktadır.
courses.description:
Bu kurs, güvenlik uzmanları, adli bilişim uzmanları ve siber güvenlik profesyonelleri ve " kedini geliştirmek isteyenler " için tasarlanmıştır. Kurs içeriği, DARK WEB' in güvenlik araştırmalarında ve soruşturmalarda nasıl kullanılabileceğini anlamak amacıyla hazırlanmıştır.
Günümüz dünyasında internetin sunduğu olanaklar kadar, gizlilik ve güvenlik de büyük önem taşımaktadır. Birçok kişi, internette iz bırakmadan gezinmek, anonim kalmak ve kişisel verilerini korumak istemektedir. Peki, anonimlik nedir? Tor ağı nasıl çalışır? Dark Web ve Deep Web arasındaki farklar nelerdir? Kendi anonim altyapınızı nasıl oluşturabilirsiniz?
Bu kurs, internetin derinliklerini keşfetmek, siber güvenlik konusunda uzmanlaşmak ve anonim ağlar üzerinde güvenli bir şekilde hareket etmek isteyenler için özel olarak hazırlanmıştır. VirtualBox ile sanal makine kurulumu, Kali Linux işletim sistemi yönetimi, web sunucu yapılandırmaları ve Tor ağına dair her detayı öğrenebileceğiniz bu eğitimde, teknik bilgiyi uygulamalı derslerle pekiştirme fırsatı bulacaksınız.
Kursun Hedefleri
Bu eğitimde, siber güvenlik, anonim ağlar ve web sunucu yönetimi konularında yetkinlik kazanarak aşağıdaki becerilere sahip olacaksınız:
Sanal makineler ve işletim sistemleri hakkında temel ve ileri düzey bilgi sahibi olmak
Kali Linux kurulumu ve yapılandırması konusunda uzmanlaşmak
Web sunucularının çalışma mantığını ve yönetimini öğrenmek
Tor ağı ve Dark Web konusunda detaylı bilgi edinmek
Onion sitelerinin yapısını anlamak ve bir Onion sitesi yayına almak
Anonim ağlar ve hosting firmaları hakkında detaylı bilgi sahibi olmak
Tor tarayıcısı ve alternatif araçların nasıl kullanıldığını öğrenmek
Raspberry Pi kullanarak bir Tor sunucusu oluşturmak
İnternet trafiğini izlemek ve meta verileri temizlemek için güvenlik yöntemleri geliştirmek
Sunucuya güvenli yollardan erişim
DAHA BİR ÇOK ŞEY ÖĞRENECEKSİNİZ
Bu beceriler sayesinde, siber güvenlik alanında farkındalık kazanacak ve internet üzerinde daha bilinçli hareket edebileceksiniz.
target_audience: Siber güvenlik alanında kendini geliştirmek isteyenler
Anonimlik ve Tor ağı hakkında bilgi edinmek isteyenler
Kendi web sunucusunu kurmayı öğrenmek isteyenler
Raspberry Pi kullanarak projeler geliştirmek isteyenler
Dark Web hakkında bilinçli ve güvenli bilgi edinmek isteyenler

courses.title: Roteadores Huawei na Prática | Do Zero ao Avançado [2025]
courses.bio: Do Básico ao Avançado em Roteadores Huawei – OSPF, BGP, ACLs, NAT, VRRP e muito mais...
objectives: Configurar roteadores Huawei desde os conceitos básicos até recursos avançados.
Trabalhar com interfaces, endereçamento IP e roteamento estático.
Implementar protocolos de roteamento dinâmico como OSPF, BGP e RIP.
Criar e aplicar ACLs (Access Control Lists) para segurança de rede.
Utilizar VRRP para alta disponibilidade e redundância de roteadores.
Se preparar para certificações Huawei, como HCIA e HCIP Routing & Switching.
Executar comandos de diagnóstico e troubleshooting em cenários reais.

Routing: Revisão IPv4 e máscara de sub-rede
Roteamento Dinâmico: Redistribuição de rotas entre protocolos dinâmicos
Detalhes sobre protocolos de roteamento dinâmico

requirements: Vontade de aprender sobre redes e roteadores Huawei.
Conhecimentos básicos de redes (endereços IP, máscara, gateway) são bem-vindos, mas não obrigatórios.
Um computador com acesso à internet para instalar simuladores ou utilizar laboratórios online.
Opcional: acesso a simuladores como Huawei eNSP, GNS3 ou EVE-NG (explicado no curso como configurar).
courses.description:
Ansioso para aprender comandos Huawei?
Você tem pouco ou nenhum conhecimento da configuração de roteadores Huawei?
Você quer aprender ou começar uma carreira na Huawei?
Este curso foi projetado para aprender a configurar roteadores Huawei do zero e passo a passo. De forma sequencial, desde a definição do nome de um roteador, até a configuração de uma rede avançada com protocolos de roteamento dinâmico.
Projetado para estudantes que estão iniciando no mundo da configuração de roteadores Huawei através de sua CLI (Command Line Interface) e que precisam construir redes em seus locais de trabalho, laboratórios de aprendizagem, preparação para a certificação Huawei HCIA, iniciar uma carreira Huawei, etc.
Este curso executará cada uma das configurações passo a passo, para que o aluno possa aprender cada recurso da Huawei e praticá-los em roteadores reais ou simulados por meio de ferramentas como eNSP, Eve-NG e/ou GNS3.
Além do entendimento de cada comando, comandos de diagnóstico serão reproduzidos, de forma que os alunos possam encontrar erros de implementação e configuração em seus projetos de rede.
Este curso aborda tópicos de rede essenciais para realizar o aprendizado e gerenciamento de conceitos de configuração de roteadores Huawei. Todos os tópicos foram cuidadosamente selecionados para que o aluno aprendesse os conceitos de configuração de dispositivos Huawei.
Se você quiser aprender tudo sobre roteadores Huawei, este é o SEU CURSO.
Não espere mais e vamos começar a aprender juntos hoje!
target_audience: Estudantes e profissionais de redes que desejam aprender roteadores Huawei na prática.
Quem está começando na área de redes e quer construir uma base sólida em configuração e roteamento.
Profissionais que já trabalham com Cisco, Mikrotik ou Fortinet e querem expandir habilidades para Huawei.
Interessados em se preparar para certificações Huawei HCIA e HCIP.
Qualquer pessoa que queira aprender, do zero ao avançado, como configurar e gerenciar roteadores Huawei.
Pessoas que desejam praticar laboratórios em simuladores como eNSP, EVE-NG ou GNS3.

courses.title: FortiAuthenticator ile Şifreyi Unutun, Güvenliği Artırın
courses.bio: FortiAuthenticator ile kimlik doğrulama, MFA, kullanıcı yönetimi ve Zero Trust güvenliği konularında uzmanlaşın.
objectives: FortiAuthenticator Temelleri ve Kullanım Alanları
FortiAuthenticator Kurulum ve Yapılandırma Adımları
Kimlik Doğrulama Protokollerinin Yapılandırılması
Çok Faktörlü Kimlik Doğrulama (MFA) Yapılandırması
requirements: Temel Seviyede Bilgisayar Bilgisi
Orta Seviye Network Bilgisi
courses.description:
FortiAuthenticator Eğitimi: Dijital Güvenlikte Ustalığa Giden Yol
Bu kapsamlı eğitim ile FortiAuthenticator’ı öğrenin ve kimlik doğrulama, erişim güvenliği, kullanıcı yönetimi ve çok faktörlü doğrulama (MFA) gibi kritik alanlarda uzmanlaşın. Dijital güvenlikte bir adım önde olmanızı sağlayacak bu kurs, hem temel hem de ileri düzey bilgileri adım adım sunarak FortiAuthenticator’ı etkin kullanabilmenizi sağlar.
Eğitim sonunda kimlik doğrulama protokollerini (LDAP, RADIUS, SAML) doğru şekilde yapılandırarak, kullanıcılar ve gruplar için güvenli erişim çözümleri geliştirme becerisine sahip olacaksınız. Çok faktörlü kimlik doğrulama (MFA) ve Zero Trust güvenlik mimarisi gibi kritik güvenlik katmanlarını nasıl entegre edebileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.
Bu kurs sayesinde, FortiAuthenticator’ı kurma ve yapılandırma süreçlerini başarıyla yönetebilecek, kullanıcı ve grup yönetimini profesyonelce yapabilecek ve güvenlik politikaları oluşturma konusunda derinlemesine bilgi sahibi olacaksınız. Ayrıca, gerçek dünyadan alınan örneklerle, FortiAuthenticator’ı kullanarak güvenli erişim senaryoları tasarlayabilecek, sisteminizi ve verilerinizi güvence altına alabileceksiniz.
Bu eğitim, yalnızca teorik bilgiler sunmakla kalmaz, aynı zamanda uygulamalı alıştırmalar ve örnek senaryolar ile FortiAuthenticator’ı gerçek dünyada nasıl kullanacağınızı gösterir. Eğitim sonunda, sistem güvenliğinizi en üst düzeye çıkaracak, organizasyonunuza özel güvenlik çözümleri geliştirebileceksiniz.
FortiAuthenticator ile güçlü kimlik doğrulama çözümleri oluşturacak, dijital erişim güvenliğinizi sağlayarak, her türlü siber tehdit ve riski minimize edeceksiniz. Eğer amacınız güvenlik seviyenizi artırmak, erişim kontrollerini güçlendirmek ve organizasyonunuzun dijital altyapısını korumaksa, bu kurs sizin için ideal! Bu kursu tamamladığınızda, FortiAuthenticator ile güçlü ve güvenli bir dijital ortam yaratmaya hazır olacaksınız.
target_audience: Siber Güvenlik Uzmanları
Siber Güvenlik Mühendisleri
Network Engineer

courses.title: Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi (IAM) Eğitimi
courses.bio: IAM, kullanıcı doğrulama, yetkilendirme, erişim kontrolü ve siber güvenlik temellerini adım adım öğrenin
objectives: Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi temellerini öğrenin, siber güvenlikte kimlik doğrulama ve erişim kontrolü kavramlarını kavrayın
Siber güvenlikte Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi kavramlarını, doğrulama ve yetkilendirme süreçlerini detaylı öğrenin
Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi bileşenlerini, kullanıcı yaşam döngüsünü ve erişim kontrol adımlarını öğrenin.
Siber güvenlikte IAM yaşam döngüsünü, erişim politikalarını ve kullanıcı yönetimi süreçlerini kavrayın.
Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi bileşenlerini, kullanıcı yaşam döngüsünü ve erişim kontrol adımlarını öğrenin.
IAM bileşenlerini, kullanıcı yaşam döngüsünü ve erişim kontrol adımlarını öğrenin.

Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi Nedir ve Neden: Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi Nedir Organizasyonlar İçin Neden Önemli
Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi Bileşenleri: Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi Temel Bileşenleri
Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi Yaşam Döngüsü: Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi Yaşam Döngüsü

requirements: Temel IAM eğitimi; hem yeni başlayanlara hem de siber güvenlik bilgilerini tazelemek isteyen orta ve ileri seviye uzmanlara uygundur.
Temel seviye Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi eğitimi; siber güvenlik bilgilerini tazelemek isteyen orta ve üst düzey katılımcılar için de uygundur.
courses.description:
Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi (IAM), modern siber güvenlik stratejilerinin en kritik yapı taşlarından biridir. Bu eğitim, hem yeni başlayanlar hem de mevcut bilgilerini tazelemek isteyen profesyoneller için tasarlanmıştır. Kurs boyunca IAM’in temellerini, kimlik doğrulama, yetkilendirme ve erişim kontrolü gibi siber güvenlik açısından hayati konuları adım adım öğreneceksiniz.
Eğitimimizde kullanıcı yaşam döngüsü yönetimi, IAM bileşenleri, politikalar ve en iyi uygulamalar gibi konular detaylı olarak ele alınır. Gerçek dünyadan örnekler, örnek senaryolar ile teorik temel bilgileri kavrama fırsatı bulacaksınız.
Bu eğitimde, IAM’in temel kavramlarını, kimlik doğrulama ve yetkilendirme süreçlerini, güvenlik ilkelerini ve sektörde kullanılan en iyi pratikleri adım adım inceleyeceğiz. Amacımız, sadece teknik terimleri öğrenmek değil, aynı zamanda bunların gerçek hayatta nasıl uygulandığını ve güvenlik risklerini nasıl azalttığını görmek.
Kurs sonunda kazanacaklarınız:
Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi'nin (IAM) temel kavramlarını açıklayabilme.
Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi'nin organizasyonların siber güvenlik stratejisinde ki yeri ve önemini açıklayabilme.
Kimlik, hesap, rol, grup kavramlarını farklarını açıklayabilme ve bu kavramlar arasında ilişki kurabilme.
Kimlik, hesap, rol, grup kavramlarını kimlik ve erişim yönetimi yaşam döngüsü içerisinde konumlandırabilme.
Erişim kontrolü ve yetkilendirme stratejileri oluşturabilme.
IAM'da hesap verilebilirliğin önemini kavrama.
Siber güvenlik ve uyumluluk gerekliliklerine uygun IAM tasarımları.
Eğer siber güvenlik alanında kariyer yapmak, Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi (IAM) uzmanı olmak veya mevcut bilgierinizi geliştirmek istiyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre. Şimdi Kaydolun!
target_audience: Kimlik ve Erişim Yönetimi alanında temel bilgi edinmek isteyenler, siber güvenlik kariyerine adım atanlar ve bilgilerini tazelemek isteyen profesyoneller.

Bu kursu anlayarak tamamladıktan sonra Internete hizmeti veren sunucuların çalışma mantığının anlaşılması ve DataCenter tarafındaki yapıların mantığı hakkında daha geniş bir iç açılıma ship olamanız öngörülmektedir.

Bu kursta Network Address Translations'ın Gerçek Senaryolar Üzerinden Nasıl çalıştığı Anlatılacaktır. Bu Senaryolar, Simülasyon Programı Üzerinden Gerçek Hayat Uygulamalarının Birebir Aynısı ile Sağlanmaktadır. Kursun Sonunda Kişiler, Router, Firewall, Modem gibi Cihazlar ile WAN'dan Erişmek İstedikleri Servislere Uzaktan Erişme ya da Profesyonel Sebepler Dolayısıyla Internet Kullanıcılarına, WEB,DNS vb. Servis Sağlayabilme Yetisi Edineceklerdir.
Konuya ilgili ya da sektörde iş bulmak isteyen kişiler için temel oluşturmak amaçlanmıştır. Vidyoların izlenmesi ve hazmedilmesi sonrası konu hakkında dökümanların okunması tavsiye edilmektedir. İki saat üç dakika toplam vidyo uzunluğudur. Konuların temeli için yeterli uzmanlık için kısıtlı bir süredir. Konu Cisco simülasyon cihazlar üzerinde anlatılmıştır ancak genel geçer bilgiler içeren dersler tüm ürünlerin yönetimi, tasarımı için yeterli seviyededir.
Anlaşılmayan noktalar için iletmiş olduğunuz sorulara hemen yanıt verilemeyebilir. Tüm sorularınız için önce google araması yapmanızı sonrasında daha da filtrelenmiş sorular ile ulaşmanız verilen yanıtın hazmedilmesi açısında önemlidir.
Konuları ya da komutları ezberlemenize gerek yok mantığı anlamanız önemli. Komutları ya da ezber gereken noktaları internetten kolayca bulmak mümkündür. Bu sebepten ana noktayı kaçırmamak adına konuları dinlerken ya unutursam ya hatırlayamazsa karmaşasına girmenize gerek olmadığı kanaatindeyim.

Çok çalışmak değil sürekli çalışmak seni hayallerine ve hedeflerine ulaştıracaktır.
Bu bir yolculuk, otobüs değişir, benzin biter, arkadaşlar gider, yolculuk devam eder. Geri dönüp baktığında iyi ki demen dileğiyle.

courses.description:
Transform your networking knowledge from theory to practice with Network+ Pro Bootcamp! Whether you’re starting from scratch or brushing up for the Network+ exam, this course delivers hands‑on labs, real‑world scenarios, and exam‑ready strategies—no fluff, no filler.
You’ll dive into:

Exam Confidence: Master test‑taking tactics, myth‑bust common pitfalls, and practice hundreds of realistic questions to ensure you walk into the exam calm and prepared.
Joining Network+ Pro Bootcamp gives you lifetime access to:

courses.title: Dark Web: Construa um Site Anônimo do Zero
courses.bio: Aprenda a Montar e Gerenciar Seu Próprio Site na Rede Onion com Segurança e Anonimato
objectives: Configuração de Servidor Web Seguro na Deep Web
Criação de um Serviço Onion
Proteção e Anonimato
Hospedagem de Serviços
requirements: Experiência mínima com comandos Linux
Conhecimento básico de redes
courses.description:
A rede Tor (The Onion Router) oferece uma série de benefícios, especialmente para aqueles que buscam maior privacidade e anonimato online. A principal vantagem da rede Tor é a capacidade de navegar na internet sem revelar sua identidade ou localização. O tráfego é criptografado e roteado por meio de vários nós voluntários (camadas), dificultando o rastreamento do usuário.
Neste curso prático, você aprenderá a configurar e implementar um servidor web acessível pela rede Onion, utilizando a tecnologia do Tor. Exploraremos o funcionamento da rede Onion, os benefícios do anonimato e da privacidade, além de ensinar passo a passo como criar e publicar seu próprio site e auto hospedando sua aplicação de maneira rápida e prática. O curso é ideal tanto para iniciantes quanto para profissionais que desejam expandir seus conhecimentos sobre privacidade digital e redes descentralizadas.


O que você aprenderá:
Conceitos básicos e avançados sobre a rede Tor e a darknet.
Instalação e configuração de um servidor web seguro.
Geração de endereços Onion e como utilizá-los.
Práticas de segurança e anonimato na rede Onion.
Como hospedar serviços ou websites na rede Onion.
Ao final do curso, você terá as habilidades necessárias para criar e gerenciar seu próprio servidor na rede Onion, contribuindo para um ecossistema online mais privado e descentralizado. Além disso, aprenderá boas práticas para proteger seus dados e evitar vulnerabilidades.
target_audience: Estudantes de Tecnologia da Informação
Profissionais de Segurança da Informação
Desenvolvedores e Entusiastas de Privacidade
Estudantes de Rede de Computadores
Desenvolvedores
