courses.description:
Günümüzde çevremize baktığımızda tüm cihazların bir Network’ün parçası olduğunu görüyoruz, elimizdeki cep telefonundan, evimizdeki televizyona, kolumuzdaki saatimizden şirketimizdeki bilgisayara kadar tüm cihazlar bir Network’e bağlanıyor ve sürekli bir iletişim halinde bulunuyor,
Çevremiz bu kadar Network ile örülmüş iken Network’ün temelini öğrenmenin önemli olduğunu değerlendiriyoruz,
Çünkü Network günümüzde Teknolojinin temel taşını oluşturuyor,
Network’ü anlamak için önce Network’ün temellerini anlamamız gerekiyor,
Bu eğitim serisinde de Network’ün temellerini ayrıntılı olarak görüyor olacağız.
Network’ü oluşturmak için iki cihazı birbirine bağlamamız gerekiyor,
Bu bağlantı iki cihaz için de geçerli, interneti oluşturan milyonlarca network cihazı için de geçerli, yani aynı mantıkla yapılıyor,
Bu bağlantılar bakır bir kablo ile yapılabiliyor veya fiber bir kablo ile yapılabiliyor veya günümüzde en çok kullanılan hali ile wireless yani kablosuz bağlantı ile yapılabiliyor,
Yani elektrik, ışık veya hava kullanılarak bu bağlantılar sağlanabiliyor,

Günümüzde, Network’e baktığımızda aslında her yerde onu görebiliyoruz,
Evimizde internete bağlanmak için bir network oluşturuyoruz, telefonlarımızı tabletlerimizi kullanırken network’ü kullanıyoruz,
Bu evimizde oluşturulduğumuz Network’ten de internet’e erişerek aslında ağlar ağı dediğimiz en büyük Network’e erişmiş oluyoruz,
Bu eğitimi Network konusunda bilgi edinmek isteyen ve halen Network alanında çalışanlar için hazırladık,
Eğitimin yapısına baktığımızda; Eğitimimiz iki bölümden oluşuyor, birinci bölümde; Temel Network Kavramlarını, OSİ ve TCP/IP modelini (Fiziksel katman, Veri Bağı Katmanı, Network Katmanı, Taşıma Katmanı, Oturum Katmanı, Sunum Katmanı, Uygulama Katmanı) ve Temel Ethernet kavramını göreceğiz,
İkinci bölümümüzde de Temel IP kavramını, Network Türlerini, Network Cihazlarını, ve temel Network Protokollerini görüyor olacağız.
target_audience: Bu eğitim Network hakkında bilgi edinmek isteyen herkes için hazırlanmıştır.

courses.description:
Have you ever wondered what lies beneath the surface of the internet? This Tamil-language course will take you on a powerful and eye-opening journey into the world of the Dark Web, online anonymity, and privacy vs surveillance. Whether you're a beginner or just someone curious about the secret side of the internet, this course is designed to give you a deep understanding of how things work behind the scenes — all in simple, clear Tamil.
You’ll start with the basics — understanding hackers, debunking common myths about hacking, and exploring the differences between the Surface Web, Deep Web, and Dark Web. Then, you'll dive into tools like the Tor Browser, Tails OS, and VPNs to learn how to protect your identity and stay anonymous online.
Learn how to create fake identities, use secure email services, communicate anonymously, and explore the hidden marketplaces and forums of the dark web. You’ll also be introduced to Bitcoin, blockchain basics, and how dark web transactions work. Finally, you’ll even discover how to host your own website on the dark web.
We’ll also cover topics like anonymous file sharing methods, hidden search engines like Shodan, and how to build secure conversations using the right privacy tools. You’ll understand the importance of protecting your digital footprint in today’s world where surveillance and data tracking have become the norm.
This course isn’t just about theory — it includes hands-on demonstrations and real-world tools you can start using immediately. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, student, ethical hacker, or someone who values digital freedom, this course gives you the foundation to explore safely and smartly.
No prior technical knowledge is required. If you're curious about cybersecurity, dark net exploration, or simply want to understand how to maintain privacy in the digital age — this course is for you.
Join thousands of learners and take control of your online privacy and digital independence. Enroll now and explore the unknown — safely, responsibly, and confidently.
Whether you're a curious learner or someone concerned about digital privacy, this course has something for you.
What You’ll Learn:
Understand the differences between the Surface Web, Deep Web, and Dark Web
Learn the myths and truths about hacking and hackers
Discover how to stay anonymous online using tools like:
Tor Browser
VPNs
Tails OS
Create fake identities and protect your real digital presence
Use secure email services and hidden communication platforms
Build anonymous conversations without revealing your identity
Learn file sharing methods that keep you untraceable
Explore Dark Web search engines like Shodan
Get introduced to Bitcoin and Blockchain, and how they work on the dark web
Understand how to host a website on the Dark Web safely
Learn about dark web forums, marketplaces, and how they operate
See the difference between privacy vs anonymity and when to use each
Explore practical use cases for journalists, whistleblowers, and privacy lovers
target_audience: Want to Explore Dark web & Want be a Hacker & Curious on  Internet.

courses.title: Core Networking Fundamentals For Ethical Hacking in (தமிழ்)
courses.bio: Understanding And Mastering All The Networking Prerequisites Required For Ethical Hacking
objectives: Fundamental networking concepts: Understand the basics of computer networks, including LAN, WAN, circuit switching, and packet switching.
OSI Model and TCP/IP stack: Gain knowledge about the OSI model's layers and how the TCP/IP stack is practically applied in modern networks.
Transport Layer and Protocols: Differentiate between TCP and UDP and comprehend their roles in end-to-end communication.
IP addressing, Subnetting, and Routing: Learn about IP address classes, subnetting techniques, and various routing protocols used in network communication.
requirements: Basic Computer Literacy: Learners should have a general understanding of how to use a computer and browse the internet.
Familiarity with Operating Systems: A basic knowledge of operating systems like Windows, macOS, or Linux will be beneficial.
Internet Connectivity: Access to a reliable internet connection is necessary to access course materials and resources.
courses.description:
Embark on a thrilling journey into the world of networking and its vital role in ethical hacking. This comprehensive course is designed to equip aspiring ethical hackers and cybersecurity enthusiasts with a solid understanding of networking concepts. From the foundational elements to advanced protocols, learners will explore the inner workings of computer networks, laying the groundwork for secure and ethical hacking practices. Through engaging lectures, real-world examples, and hands-on exercises, students will gain the knowledge and skills necessary to navigate the complex landscape of modern networks confidently.
Course Contents:
Module 1: Introduction to Networking Discover the heart of networking as we explore the fundamentals. We'll delve into different network types such as Local Area Networks (LANs) and Wide Area Networks (WANs). Additionally, learn the distinctions between circuit switching and packet switching and how they influence network performance.
Module 2: Types of Packet Switching and Datagram Approach Immerse yourself in the world of packet switching, understanding both virtual circuit switching and the more versatile datagram approach. Explore the inner workings of datagrams and how they contribute to efficient data transmission.
Module 3: OSI Model and TCP/IP Stack Unravel the intricate layers of the OSI model and their significance in networking. We'll then delve into the practical TCP/IP stack, exploring how it powers the modern internet and enables seamless communication.
Module 4: TCP/IP Stack and the Protocol Family Suite Delve deeper into the TCP/IP protocol suite, understanding how different protocols interconnect and facilitate end-to-end communication. Explore the protocol family suite that drives the functioning of the internet as we know it.
Module 5: Complete Explanation of TCP/IP Layers Embark on a detailed journey through each layer of the TCP/IP model. From the Network Layer to the Application Layer, uncover the inner workings of these protocols, gaining a comprehensive understanding of their roles in network communication.
Module 6: Transport Layer: TCP vs. UDP Explore the Transport Layer and its key players, TCP (Transmission Control Protocol) and UDP (User Datagram Protocol). Understand their respective strengths, weaknesses, and ideal use cases for secure and reliable communication.
Module 7: Fragmentation in the IP Layer Discover the critical concept of IP fragmentation. Learn how networks handle large packets and reassemble them efficiently for successful data delivery.
Module 8: Classes of IP and Subnetting Dive into the world of IP addressing, understanding the different classes of IP addresses (A, B, C, D, and E) and their specific purposes. Master the art of subnetting to create smaller, manageable networks.
Module 9: Routing Protocols Gain insight into the world of routing protocols, including RIP, OSPF, and BGP. Explore their unique features, use cases, and how they facilitate dynamic network routing.
Module 10: IPv6 and Comparison with IPv4 Embrace the future of networking with IPv6. Discover its advantages over IPv4 and its potential to revolutionize the internet. Compare both versions and comprehend the transition from IPv4 to IPv6.
Module 11: Hands-on Exercises Apply your knowledge practically with a series of hands-on exercises. Engage in real-world scenarios, simulations, and labs to solidify your understanding of networking concepts in an ethical hacking context.
Join us on this immersive journey of networking and ethical hacking, and be prepared to take your first steps into the world of secure, responsible, and ethical network exploration.
Prerequisites: Basic computer literacy and familiarity with operating systems (Windows, macOS, or Linux) are recommended, but no prior networking or ethical hacking experience is required. This course is beginner-friendly, and learners from all backgrounds are welcome to join the adventure of discovering the hidden secrets of networks.


நெட்வொர்க்கிங் மற்றும் நெறிமுறை ஹேக்கிங்கில் அதன் முக்கிய பங்கு உலகில் ஒரு பரபரப்பான பயணத்தைத் தொடங்குங்கள். நெட்வொர்க்கிங் கருத்துகளைப் பற்றிய உறுதியான புரிதலுடன், நெறிமுறை ஹேக்கர்கள் மற்றும் இணைய பாதுகாப்பு ஆர்வலர்களை சித்தப்படுத்துவதற்காக இந்த விரிவான பாடநெறி வடிவமைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. அடித்தளக் கூறுகள் முதல் மேம்பட்ட நெறிமுறைகள் வரை, கற்பவர்கள் கணினி நெட்வொர்க்குகளின் உள் செயல்பாடுகளை ஆராய்வார்கள், பாதுகாப்பான மற்றும் நெறிமுறை ஹேக்கிங் நடைமுறைகளுக்கு அடித்தளத்தை அமைப்பார்கள். ஈடுபாட்டுடன் கூடிய விரிவுரைகள், நிஜ உலக எடுத்துக்காட்டுகள் மற்றும் பயிற்சிகள் மூலம், நவீன நெட்வொர்க்குகளின் சிக்கலான நிலப்பரப்பில் நம்பிக்கையுடன் செல்லத் தேவையான அறிவு மற்றும் திறன்களை மாணவர்கள் பெறுவார்கள்.


பாடத்தின் உள்ளடக்கம்:


தொகுதி 1: நெட்வொர்க்கிங் அறிமுகம் அடிப்படைகளை நாம் ஆராயும்போது நெட்வொர்க்கிங்கின் இதயத்தைக் கண்டறியவும். லோக்கல் ஏரியா நெட்வொர்க்குகள் (LANகள்) மற்றும் வைட் ஏரியா நெட்வொர்க்குகள் (WANகள்) போன்ற பல்வேறு நெட்வொர்க் வகைகளை நாங்கள் ஆராய்வோம். கூடுதலாக, சர்க்யூட் ஸ்விட்ச்சிங் மற்றும் பாக்கெட் ஸ்விட்சிங் ஆகியவற்றுக்கு இடையேயான வேறுபாடுகள் மற்றும் அவை நெட்வொர்க் செயல்திறனை எவ்வாறு பாதிக்கின்றன என்பதை அறியவும்.


தொகுதி 2: பாக்கெட் ஸ்விட்ச்சிங் மற்றும் டேட்டாகிராம் அணுகுமுறையின் வகைகள் மெய்நிகர் சர்க்யூட் ஸ்விட்சிங் மற்றும் மிகவும் பல்துறை டேட்டாகிராம் அணுகுமுறை இரண்டையும் புரிந்துகொண்டு, பாக்கெட் ஸ்விட்ச்சிங் உலகில் மூழ்கிவிடுங்கள். டேட்டாகிராம்களின் உள் செயல்பாடுகள் மற்றும் அவை திறமையான தரவு பரிமாற்றத்திற்கு எவ்வாறு பங்களிக்கின்றன என்பதை ஆராயுங்கள்.


தொகுதி 3: OSI மாடல் மற்றும் TCP/IP ஸ்டாக் OSI மாதிரியின் சிக்கலான அடுக்குகளையும் நெட்வொர்க்கிங்கில் அவற்றின் முக்கியத்துவத்தையும் அவிழ்த்து விடுகின்றன. நடைமுறையில் TCP/IP ஸ்டேக்கை ஆராய்வோம், இது நவீன இணையத்தை எவ்வாறு இயக்குகிறது மற்றும் தடையற்ற தகவல்தொடர்புகளை செயல்படுத்துகிறது என்பதை ஆராய்வோம்.


தொகுதி 4: டிசிபி/ஐபி ஸ்டாக் மற்றும் புரோட்டோகால் ஃபேமிலி சூட் ஆகியவை டிசிபி/ஐபி புரோட்டோகால் தொகுப்பில் ஆழமாக ஆராய்கின்றன, வெவ்வேறு நெறிமுறைகள் எவ்வாறு ஒன்றோடொன்று இணைக்கப்படுகின்றன மற்றும் இறுதி முதல் இறுதித் தொடர்பை எளிதாக்குகின்றன. நமக்குத் தெரிந்தபடி இணையத்தின் செயல்பாட்டை இயக்கும் நெறிமுறை குடும்பத் தொகுப்பை ஆராயுங்கள்.


தொகுதி 5: TCP/IP அடுக்குகளின் முழுமையான விளக்கம் TCP/IP மாதிரியின் ஒவ்வொரு அடுக்கு வழியாகவும் விரிவான பயணத்தைத் தொடங்குங்கள். நெட்வொர்க் லேயர் முதல் அப்ளிகேஷன் லேயர் வரை, இந்த நெறிமுறைகளின் உள் செயல்பாடுகளைக் கண்டறியவும், நெட்வொர்க் தகவல்தொடர்புகளில் அவற்றின் பங்கு பற்றிய விரிவான புரிதலைப் பெறவும்.


தொகுதி 6: போக்குவரத்து அடுக்கு: TCP vs. UDP டிரான்ஸ்போர்ட் லேயர் மற்றும் அதன் முக்கிய வீரர்களான TCP (டிரான்ஸ்மிஷன் கண்ட்ரோல் புரோட்டோகால்) மற்றும் UDP (பயனர் டேட்டாகிராம் புரோட்டோகால்) ஆகியவற்றை ஆராயுங்கள். பாதுகாப்பான மற்றும் நம்பகமான தகவல்தொடர்புக்கான அந்தந்த பலம், பலவீனங்கள் மற்றும் சிறந்த பயன்பாட்டு நிகழ்வுகளைப் புரிந்து கொள்ளுங்கள்.


தொகுதி 7: ஐபி லேயரில் துண்டாக்குதல் ஐபி துண்டாக்கத்தின் முக்கியமான கருத்தைக் கண்டறியவும். நெட்வொர்க்குகள் பெரிய பாக்கெட்டுகளை எவ்வாறு கையாளுகின்றன மற்றும் வெற்றிகரமான தரவு விநியோகத்திற்காக அவற்றை திறமையாக மீண்டும் இணைக்கின்றன என்பதை அறியவும்.


தொகுதி 8: ஐபி மற்றும் சப்நெட்டிங் வகுப்புகள் ஐபி முகவரிகளின் உலகில் மூழ்கி, வெவ்வேறு வகை ஐபி முகவரிகள் (ஏ, பி, சி, டி மற்றும் இ) மற்றும் அவற்றின் குறிப்பிட்ட நோக்கங்களைப் புரிந்துகொள்வது. சிறிய, நிர்வகிக்கக்கூடிய நெட்வொர்க்குகளை உருவாக்க சப்நெட்டிங் கலையில் தேர்ச்சி பெறுங்கள்.


தொகுதி 9: ரூட்டிங் நெறிமுறைகள் RIP, OSPF மற்றும் BGP உள்ளிட்ட ரூட்டிங் நெறிமுறைகளின் உலகத்தைப் பற்றிய நுண்ணறிவைப் பெறுகின்றன. அவற்றின் தனித்துவமான அம்சங்களை ஆராயவும், வழக்குகளைப் பயன்படுத்தவும், மேலும் அவை டைனமிக் நெட்வொர்க் ரூட்டிங்கை எவ்வாறு எளிதாக்குகின்றன.


தொகுதி 10: IPv6 மற்றும் IPv4 உடன் ஒப்பீடு IPv6 உடன் நெட்வொர்க்கிங் எதிர்காலத்தைத் தழுவுகிறது. IPv4 ஐ விட அதன் நன்மைகள் மற்றும் இணையத்தில் புரட்சியை ஏற்படுத்தும் திறனைக் கண்டறியவும். இரண்டு பதிப்புகளையும் ஒப்பிட்டு, IPv4 இலிருந்து IPv6 க்கு மாறுவதைப் புரிந்துகொள்ளவும்.


தொகுதி 11: ஹேண்ட்ஸ்-ஆன் பயிற்சிகள் உங்கள் அறிவை நடைமுறையில் தொடர்ச்சியான பயிற்சிகள் மூலம் பயன்படுத்தவும். நெறிமுறை ஹேக்கிங் சூழலில் நெட்வொர்க்கிங் கருத்துகளைப் பற்றிய உங்கள் புரிதலை உறுதிப்படுத்த நிஜ உலக காட்சிகள், உருவகப்படுத்துதல்கள் மற்றும் ஆய்வகங்களில் ஈடுபடுங்கள்.


நெட்வொர்க்கிங் மற்றும் நெறிமுறை ஹேக்கிங்கின் இந்த அதிவேக பயணத்தில் எங்களுடன் சேருங்கள், மேலும் பாதுகாப்பான, பொறுப்பான மற்றும் நெறிமுறை நெட்வொர்க் ஆய்வு உலகில் உங்கள் முதல் படிகளை எடுக்க தயாராக இருங்கள்.


முன்நிபந்தனைகள்: அடிப்படை கணினி கல்வியறிவு மற்றும் இயக்க முறைமைகளுடன் (விண்டோஸ், மேகோஸ் அல்லது லினக்ஸ்) பரிச்சயம் பரிந்துரைக்கப்படுகிறது, ஆனால் முன் நெட்வொர்க்கிங் அல்லது நெறிமுறை ஹேக்கிங் அனுபவம் தேவையில்லை. இந்த பாடநெறி ஆரம்பநிலைக்கு ஏற்றது, மேலும் அனைத்து பின்னணியில் இருந்தும் கற்றவர்கள் நெட்வொர்க்குகளின் மறைக்கப்பட்ட ரகசியங்களைக் கண்டறியும் சாகசத்தில் சேர வரவேற்கப்படுகிறார்கள்.
target_audience: Aspiring Ethical Hackers: Those who want to build a solid understanding of networking concepts as a foundation for pursuing a career in ethical hacking or cybersecurity.
IT and Networking Enthusiasts: Individuals with a passion for technology, computer networks, and network security, seeking to enhance their knowledge and skills in the field.
Those studying computer science, information security, or related fields, who wish to grasp the essentials of networking in the context of ethical hacking.
Penetration Testers: Penetration testers aiming to improve their knowledge of how networks operate and how to identify vulnerabilities for ethical hacking purposes.

courses.title: Segurança Digital: Proteja seu Mundo Conectado
courses.bio: Aprenda como blindar seu mundo digital | Conheça os vários tipos de ameaças e saiba como evitá-las
objectives: Criar a cultura de como se proteger de Crimes digitais.
Identificar riscos ao usar rede social.
Evitar roubo de informações em computadores e Celulares
Proteger contas de e-mail e redes sociais
Identificar as principais formas de ataques cibernéticos a dispositivos
Saber o papel do Malware no crime digital
Importância da proteção de dados e os riscos associados ao vazamento de dados
Saber identificar situações de risco digital.
Como compor uma senha forte e fácil de decorar.
Como proteger sua conta do Whatsapp.
Aprender a imunizar um computador de forma simples.
Entender o que é Múltiplo fator de autenticação.

Módulo 1: Introdução à Segurança Digital: 1.2: Por que a segurança digital é essencial?
1.3: Breve história da internet e os efeitos colaterais do mundo digital
Módulo 2: Cibercrimes – Ameaças Digitais: 2.2: Cibercrime em computadores, dispositivos móveis e na nuvem + Laboratório
2.3: Cibercrime em dispositivos móveis e na nuvem
Módulo 3: Malwares – O Inimigo Invisível: Aula 3.1: O que é um malware?
Laboratório: Ferramentas de imunização contra Malwares
Módulo 4: Prevenção e Boas Práticas: Aula 4.1: Autenticação de dois fatores e MFA
Laboratório: A “magica” em criar senhas fortes
Laboratório: Backup no Google Drive e criação de um Pendrive Criptografado
Módulo 5: Dados Pessoais e a LGPD: Aula 5.1: O que é a LGPD? Como ela protege você?
Aula 5.3: Inteligência Artificial e a coleta de dados

requirements: Conhecimento básico em internet e rede social
courses.description:
Seja muito bem-vindo ao curso "Segurança Digital: Proteja seu Mundo Conectado". Vivemos em uma era em que a internet deixou de ser apenas uma ferramenta de comunicação e se tornou parte essencial da nossa vida pessoal, profissional e social. Assim como a eletricidade, a conexão digital é hoje indispensável para o funcionamento de empresas, escolas, serviços públicos e até mesmo para atividades simples do dia a dia, como fazer compras ou interagir com amigos nas redes sociais.
No entanto, junto com todas essas facilidades, surgiram também novas ameaças. Proteger suas informações, seus dispositivos e até sua identidade digital deixou de ser uma preocupação apenas de grandes empresas ou especialistas em TI. Hoje, a segurança digital é uma necessidade urgente para qualquer pessoa que utilize um smartphone, um computador ou tenha acesso à internet.
Este curso foi cuidadosamente estruturado para conduzi-lo por uma verdadeira jornada de aprendizado. Vamos começar explorando os primórdios da internet, entendendo sua evolução e o impacto que teve na transformação do mundo moderno. Em seguida, mergulharemos no universo das ameaças virtuais, desvendando os principais tipos de ataques, como phishing, malwares, ransomwares e muitos outros.
Ao longo das aulas, você aprenderá estratégias práticas e eficazes para proteger seus dispositivos, seus dados e sua identidade online. O objetivo é que, ao final deste curso, você se sinta preparado para navegar pelo mundo digital com mais consciência, confiança e segurança.
target_audience: Qualquer pessoa que queira aprender a não cair em golpes na internet, e se proteger de ataques de criminosos digitais. Proteger suas redes sociais e aprender a criar camadas de segurança.

courses.title: Introduction to Telecommunications: A Beginner's Guide
courses.bio: أساسيات الاتصالات السلكية واللاسلكية: فهم نظري وعملي شامل لأنظمة الاتصال وتطورها
objectives: The fundamentals of communication engineering and its importance.
The history and evolution of communication systems.
Types of communication networks (wired and wireless).
Key concepts in signal and systems processing and modulation techniques.
Type of Modulations
Type of Filters
The difference between Analog and Digital Systems
The difference between analog and digital communications.
Fundamentals of optical and satellite communications.
Light sources and frequencies Band.
Light propagation and modulation.
Communication systems and cryptography.
Satellites, their components and functions.
Satellite Communication Applications

Chapter (1): Introduction to Telecommuni: The Role of Telecommunication Engineering in Everyday Life
Chapter (3): Signals & Systems: Expressing The Signal By Amplitude And Phase
Chapter (4): Analog and Digital Communic: Digital to Analogue Conversion (DAC) and Practical applications
Chapter (5): Optical Communications: Optical Fiber Medium and Types of Optical Detectors
Fundamentals of light propagation in optical fibers
Components of Optical Fiber Networks and Applications
Chapter (6): Satellite Communications: Error Correction, Encoding, Communication Protocols, and Applications

requirements: Basic computer skills
Basic knowledge of mathematics: (algebra, trigonometry, and basic calculus).
Familiarity with basic physics concepts: (particularly in wave propagation and signal behavior).
No prior experience in communication engineering required
Curiosity and interest in learning about communication technologies
courses.description:
أساسيات الاتصالات السلكية واللاسلكية:


يقدم هذا المقرر مقدمة شاملة ومفصلة لمجال هندسة الاتصالات ، بما في ذلك الأسس النظرية والتطبيقات العملية. إنه مصمم خصيصا للطلاب والمهنيين الذين يهدفون إلى إنشاء فهم قوي لكيفية عمل أنظمة الاتصالات وتطورها ولعب دور محوري في المجتمع الحديث. تبدأ الدورة باستكشاف الأساسيات الأساسية للاتصالات، بما في ذلك تعريفها وأهميتها وتطورها التاريخي. يوفر فحصا متعمقا لأنواع مختلفة من شبكات الاتصالات ، مثل الأنظمة السلكية واللاسلكية ، ويسلط الضوء على تطبيقاتها المتنوعة عبر صناعات متعددة ، بما في ذلك الرعاية الصحية والنقل والترفيه والمزيد.


بناء على هذه المفاهيم الأساسية ، ينتقل المقرر إلى الجوانب النظرية للاتصالات السلكية واللاسلكية ، مع التركيز على الموضوعات الهامة مثل الإشارات والأنظمة ، والأدوات الرياضية مثل تحويلات فورييه ولابلاس ، والمبادئ الأساسية بما في ذلك عرض النطاق الترددي وتصفية الإشارات وتقليل الضوضاء. سيكتسب الطلاب فهما شاملا لتقنيات التعديل التناظرية والرقمية، والتي تعتبر ضرورية لتمكين الاتصال الفعال والموثوق عبر أنواع مختلفة من القنوات.


يغطي المقرر أيضا موضوعات متقدمة ، مثل الفروق بين الأنظمة التناظرية والرقمية ، وتقنيات التحويل ، ونظرية أخذ العينات ، والتي تدعم الانتقال من الاتصال التناظري إلى الاتصال الرقمي. بنهاية الدورة ، سيكون الطلاب قد اكتسبوا فهما قويا للمبادئ والتقنيات والأجهزة التي تشكل العمود الفقري لأنظمة الاتصالات الحديثة. ستعمل هذه المعرفة على إعدادهم للدراسات المتقدمة أو المهن المهنية في هذا المجال سريع التطور والديناميكي، وتزويدهم بالمهارات اللازمة للمساهمة في تطوير تقنيات الاتصال من الجيل التالي.
target_audience: Beginner students
Aspiring engineers
Technologists
Anyone interested in wireless communication, mobile networks, and signal processing

Key privacy concepts like fiduciary, consent & SDF
Real-life risks from data misuse in everyday life
Principles and steps to protect personal and business data

Introduction: Understand The Key concepts Under Data Privacy
Everyday Privacy Risks - Misuse, Business Impact & User Rights
Privacy Principles Every business Should Know
Building A Privacy Culture - Awareness & Responsibility

requirements: No prior knowledge required
Just curiosity and a desire to protect your digital life
courses.description:
In today’s digital age, understanding privacy isn’t just important — it’s essential.
Whether you're a student, a professional, or a small business owner, this course gives you a solid foundation in data privacy. We break down complex terms into simple, relatable concepts using real-world examples and case studies.
You’ll learn what personal data really is, how it’s collected and potentially misused, and what rights users have across the world. We also walk you through the everyday risks individuals face — and what simple steps you can take to stay safe.
For businesses, this course introduces core privacy principles and responsibilities every organization should follow, no matter their size or sector.
The content is designed to be clear, concise, and practical — delivered in under an hour with visuals and narration. No legal jargon. Just focused, easy-to-understand learning.
Whether you're exploring privacy for personal awareness, team training, or regulatory readiness, this course will help you get started with confidence.
You’ll also get access to a downloadable PDF for quick reference and future learning.
Future updates, specialized modules, and advanced privacy training will build on this foundation — so you're always privacy-aware, compliance-ready, and prepared for what’s next in the digital landscape.

Enjoy Your Learning and share your feedback.
target_audience: Anyone curious about how their personal data is collected and used
Small business owners and professionals new to data protection
Students, freelancers, and early-stage entrepreneurs

courses.title: Datenschutz: Recht, Organisation und IT-Sicherheit - DSGVO
courses.bio: Teil 1 von 3 - Datenschutz, Datenschutzrecht, DSGVO, IT-Sicherheit
objectives: Grundlagen des Datenschutzrechts, der Aufbau der DSGVO sowie deren praktische Anwendung.
Das Recht auf Vergessenwerden, Schutzrechte und Infos zu betrieblichen Datenschutzbeauftragten
Technische und organisatorische Maßnahmen zur Datensicherheit sowie IT-spezifische Schnittstellen
Aspekte der Datenschutz-Folgenabschätzung, Auftragsverarbeitung und Zusammenarbeit mit Aufsichtsbehörden
Datenschutz im Arbeitsrecht, Marketing und DSGVO sowie Datenschutzmanagement-Systeme.

Organisation von Datenschutz und Datensi: Quiz zu Organisation von Datenschutz und Datensicherheit

requirements: Keine Vorkenntnisse nötig. Der Kurs ist für Anfänger geeignet.
courses.description:
In diesem Kurs setzt du dich mit den Grundlagen und vertiefenden Aspekten des Datenschutzrechts auseinander. Du lernst die geschichtliche Entwicklung sowie die internationale Bedeutung des Datenschutzes kennen und erhältst einen Überblick über die zentralen Rechtsgrundlagen. Dabei beschäftigst du dich mit dem Anwendungsbereich und dem Aufbau der europäischen Datenschutz-Grundverordnung sowie den ergänzenden Bestimmungen des Bundesdatenschutzgesetzes. Ein Schwerpunkt liegt auf den Rechten betroffener Personen, den besonderen Arten personenbezogener Daten sowie den Grundprinzipien wie Zweckbindung, Datensparsamkeit und dem Recht auf Vergessenwerden.
Die Inhalte sind thematisch gegliedert und geben dir einen strukturierten Überblick über die Rolle der Aufsichtsbehörden und die Aufgaben des betrieblichen Datenschutzbeauftragten. Du erfährst, wie Verstöße gegen den Datenschutz bewertet werden, welche rechtlichen Folgen entstehen können und wie ein Verarbeitungsverzeichnis sowie eine Datenschutz-Folgenabschätzung aufgebaut werden.
Darüber hinaus setzt du dich mit praktischen Maßnahmen auseinander. Dazu gehören die Datenschutz-Begehung, die Erstellung von Datenschutzkonzepten, die Auftragsverarbeitung sowie die Zusammenarbeit mit Aufsichtsbehörden. Ergänzend wird thematisiert, wie der Datenschutzbeauftragte ausgelagert werden kann.
Ein weiterer Schwerpunkt liegt auf den Schnittstellen zur IT. Du lernst die wichtigsten IT-Basiskomponenten kennen und erhältst einen Einblick in Authentifizierungsverfahren, Verschlüsselungsprinzipien und Cloud Computing. Abschließend setzt du dich mit aktuellen Themen wie Big Data, Marketing im Einklang mit der DSGVO, neuen Arbeitsformen sowie typischen Fehlern im Datenschutzmanagement auseinander.
Themen Überblick:
Hintergrund und Geschichte des Datenschutzes
Einführung in das Datenschutzrecht und internationale Einordnung
Anwendungsbereich und Aufbau der DSGVO
Rechte betroffener Personen und besondere Arten personenbezogener Daten
Grundprinzipien: Zweckbindung, Datensparsamkeit, Recht auf Vergessenwerden
Aufgaben des Datenschutzbeauftragten und Rolle der Aufsichtsbehörden
Folgen von Datenschutzverstößen und Prüfungsschemata
Verarbeitungsverzeichnis und Datenschutz-Folgenabschätzung
Praktische Umsetzung: Datenschutz-Begehung, Konzepte, Auftragsverarbeitung
Zusammenarbeit mit Aufsichtsbehörden und Auslagerung des Datenschutzbeauftragten
IT-Basiskomponenten, Authentifizierung, Verschlüsselung, Cloud Computing
Datenschutzmanagement-Systeme und typische Fehlerquellen
Aktuelle Herausforderungen: Big Data, Marketing, neue Arbeitsformen
target_audience: (Angehende) Datenschutzbeauftragte, die fundiertes Wissen nach DSGVO und BDSG erwerben möchten
Sicherheits- oder Compliance-Verantwortliche, die sich praxisnah weiterqualifizieren möchten
Mitarbeitende in IT, Verwaltung oder HR, die Datenschutz- und Sicherheitsanforderungen umsetzen oder dokumentieren müssen
Berufseinsteiger:innen oder Quereinsteiger:innen, die sich auf Datenschutz spezialisieren und neue Jobperspektiven erschließen wollen
Fach- und Führungskräfte aus Unternehmen, Behörden oder Organisationen, die mit personenbezogenen Daten arbeiten

courses.title: Master Network Scanning with Nmap
courses.bio: From Basics to Advanced Techniques: A Comprehensive Guide to Nmap
objectives: In this course, students will learn how to use Nmap for network reconnaissance and scanning.
They will gain a deep understanding of TCP/IP protocols and network scanning techniques.
Students will also learn how to use Nmap Scripting Engine (NSE) to develop custom scripts for network scanning.
Advanced scanning techniques such as OS detection and decoy scans
Best practices for using Nmap in ethical hacking and penetration testing scenarios
By the end of the course, students will be able to perform network scans and analyze results to identify vulnerabilities and improve security.

Basic Scanning Techniques: P1 - Get familiar with commands | Command Strcture

requirements: A basic understanding of networking concepts and protocols
Familiarity with the Linux command line and terminal
Access to a machine to run Nmap
courses.description:
Master Network Scanning with Nmap is a comprehensive course designed to teach you how to use Nmap, a powerful and versatile network scanner, to discover hosts and services on a network. In this course, you will learn how to perform basic and advanced scanning techniques, including TCP connect scan, SYN scan, UDP scan, and more. You will also learn how to use Nmap Scripting Engine (NSE) to use custom scripts and automate your scanning tasks.
The course is perfect for security professionals, network administrators, IT professionals, security analysts, and ethical hackers who want to enhance their skills and knowledge of network scanning using Nmap. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced professional, this course will provide you with the knowledge and skills necessary to master network scanning with Nmap.
You will gain hands-on experience with the Nmap scripting engine, advanced scanning techniques, and creating custom Nmap scripts. This will enable you to interpret scan results, detect security risks and misconfigurations on your network, and ultimately enhance the security of your organization.
The course is structured in a way that makes it easy to follow along, with step-by-step instructions provided for each topic covered. You will also have access to a variety of resources and materials, including videos, articles, and quizzes, to reinforce your learning and ensure that you have a thorough understanding of the course material.
In summary, if you want to master network scanning with Nmap and gain the skills necessary to identify and mitigate security risks and misconfigurations on your network, then Master Network Scanning with Nmap is the perfect course for you.
target_audience: Network and security administrators
Penetration testers and ethical hackers
IT professionals and students interested in network scanning and reconnaissance
Anyone interested in learning about Nmap and its features

requirements: 不需要任何先前的經驗 - 本課程將教您所有需要學習的內容！No prior experience is required – this course will teach you everything you need to know!
courses.description:
在數位化的時代，保護敏感資訊是全球企業的首要任務。ISO/IEC 27001 是全球公認的資訊安全管理系統（ISMS）標準，而附錄 A 是其安全控制框架的核心。
本課程將幫助您全面掌握 ISO/IEC 27001:2022 附錄 A 的 93 項控制措施。無論您是 IT 專業人士、經理、稽核員，還是企業主，本課程都將帶您深入了解每項控制措施，提供實用的洞察與可行的策略。
您將學到什麼
理解 ISO/IEC 27001:2022 附錄 A 控制措施的目的與架構。
學會如何將這些控制措施與組織的風險管理策略結合。
探索實際案例，學習如何實施和監控安全控制措施。
掌握保持合規與通過稽核的最佳實踐。
瞭解 2022 年版本中新增與修訂的控制措施。
為什麼選擇這門課程？
實用導向：透過實際案例和範例獲取實用知識。
專家指導：由擁有豐富 ISO 27001 實施與稽核經驗的行業專家授課。
稽核準備：為 ISO/IEC 27001 認證稽核奠定堅實基礎。
適用廣泛：將課程知識應用於任何行業或組織規模。
In today’s digital age, securing sensitive information is a top priority for organizations worldwide. ISO/IEC 27001 is the globally recognized standard for Information Security Management Systems (ISMS), and Annex A is the cornerstone of its security controls framework.
This comprehensive course will equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to understand, implement, and manage the 93 controls in ISO/IEC 27001:2022 Annex A. Whether you’re an IT professional, manager, auditor, or business owner, this course is designed to guide you through every aspect of the controls, providing practical insights and actionable strategies.
What You Will Learn
Understand the purpose and structure of ISO/IEC 27001:2022 Annex A controls.
Learn how to align these controls with your organization’s risk management strategy.
Explore real-world examples of implementing and monitoring security controls.
Discover best practices for maintaining compliance and passing audits.
Stay up-to-date with new and revised controls introduced in the 2022 version.
Why Enroll in This Course?
Practical Focus: Gain hands-on knowledge through real-world case studies and examples.
Expert Guidance: Learn from industry professionals with extensive experience in ISO 27001 implementation and auditing.
Certification Preparation: Build a strong foundation to ace ISO/IEC 27001 certification audits.
Scalable Knowledge: Apply the principles and controls to any industry or organization size.
target_audience: IT 專業人士：增強管理資訊安全風險的能力。IT Professionals: Enhance your skills in managing information security risks.
ISMS 管理者：加強將安全控制措施與組織目標對齊的能力。ISMS Managers: Strengthen your ability to align security controls with organizational goals.
稽核員與顧問：深化對附錄 A 控制措施的理解，支持專業工作。Auditors and Consultants: Deepen your understanding of Annex A controls to support your work.
企業主與決策者：保護企業的關鍵資產並符合國際標準。Business Owners and Decision Makers: Protect your organization’s critical assets and comply with international standards.

courses.title: Entrenamiento para la Certificación CISSP
courses.bio: Aumenta tus Posibilidades de Aprobar el Examen CISSP y Conviértete en un Líder en Ciberseguridad
objectives: Comprender e implementar marcos de gobernanza, procesos de gestión de riesgos, cumplimiento legal y normativo (por ejemplo, GDPR, HIPAA)
Clasificar, etiquetar y manejar información sensible, implementar controles de privacidad robustos, gestionar políticas de retención de datos
Aplicar varios modelos de seguridad (por ejemplo, Bell-LaPadula, Biba), utilizar principios de diseño seguro (por ejemplo, defensa en profundidad)
dominar la criptografía (simétrica, asimétrica, hashing) e Infraestructura de Clave Pública (PKI) para construir sistemas resilientes.
Tomadores de decisiones y arquitectos que necesitan una comprensión integral de los principios de seguridad para tomar decisiones estratégicas informadas.
Diseñar y asegurar arquitecturas de red utilizando firewalls, VLAN, proxies y segmentación.
Implementar canales de comunicación seguros (VPN, TLS, IPSec) e identificar ataques de red comunes y técnicas de detección.
Diferenciar y aplicar varios métodos de identificación, autenticación (incluido MFA) y autorización.
Implementar modelos de control de acceso (DAC, MAC, RBAC, ABAC) y gestionar todo el ciclo de vida de la identidad, desde el aprovisionamiento hasta la revocació
Planificar y ejecutar diferentes tipos de evaluaciones de seguridad (auditorías, revisiones, pruebas), realizar escaneo de vulnerabilidades
pruebas de penetración, comprender los ejercicios de equipos rojos/azules y utilizar métricas de seguridad y KPI para la mejora continua.
Desarrollar y gestionar planes de respuesta a incidentes, realizar análisis forenses digitales, implementar la gestión de cambios y configuración
supervisar el registro y la monitorización, gestionar las operaciones de recuperación ante desastres y continuidad del negocio, y proteger los recursos críticos
Comprender el Ciclo de Vida de Desarrollo de Software Seguro (SDLC) y las prácticas de codificación segura (por ejemplo, OWASP Top 10)
Implementar la seguridad en entornos DevOps, CI/CD y Agile, y realizar diversas técnicas de prueba de software y modelado de amenazas para aplicaciones.
Utilizar técnicas probadas para estudiar, comprender los tipos de preguntas, gestionar el tiempo de forma eficaz durante el examen
Aplicar atajos mentales para maximizar sus posibilidades de aprobar la certificación CISSP en el primer intento

requirements: Si bien la experiencia laboral formal no es un prerrequisito para inscribirse en este curso de capacitación, es crucial tener en cuenta que (ISC)² exige un mínimo de cinco años de experiencia laboral acumulada, remunerada y a tiempo completo en dos o más de los ocho dominios del CISSP CBK para ser elegible para la certificación CISSP. Este curso está diseñado para construir y mejorar el conocimiento fundamental existente.

Se recomienda encarecidamente una sólida comprensión de los conceptos básicos de redes (por ejemplo, TCP/IP, protocolos comunes), sistemas operativos (Windows, Linux), infraestructura de servidores y principios generales de seguridad de TI para maximizar su experiencia de aprendizaje.
Este es un curso riguroso y profundo que cubre una gran cantidad de material. El éxito requiere una dedicación significativa, estudio independiente y participación activa en discusiones y ejercicios.
courses.description:
Este curso intensivo y exhaustivo está meticulosamente diseñado para equipar a profesionales de ciberseguridad, aspirantes y actuales, con el conocimiento profundo y las habilidades prácticas necesarias para sobresalir en el examen Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP), una de las certificaciones más prestigiosas en el campo de la seguridad de la información. Cubriendo los ocho dominios del Cuerpo Común de Conocimiento (CBK) de CISSP, este programa proporciona una comprensión holística de los principios y prácticas de la seguridad de la información.


Desde los conceptos fundamentales de la gestión de la seguridad y el riesgo, incluyendo la Tríada CIA, modelos de gobernanza robustos y un pensamiento crítico sobre el riesgo, hasta las complejidades del desarrollo seguro de software y la seguridad operativa, los participantes obtendrán un marco sólido para diseñar, implementar y gestionar programas de ciberseguridad resilientes. El curso profundiza en áreas críticas como la seguridad de los activos, explorando la clasificación de datos, la privacidad y la sanitización de medios. Cubriremos a fondo la arquitectura e ingeniería de seguridad, adentrándonos en modelos de seguridad, principios de diseño seguro y una inmersión profunda en criptografía e Infraestructura de Clave Pública (PKI). Dominarás la comunicación y seguridad de red, comprendiendo el modelo OSI, la arquitectura de red segura, los firewalls, las VLAN y la seguridad inalámbrica. Además, el programa abarca extensamente la gestión de identidad y acceso (IAM), incluyendo métodos de autenticación, modelos de control de acceso, federación y autenticación multifactor. Finalmente, adquirirás experiencia en evaluación y pruebas de seguridad (escaneo de vulnerabilidades, pruebas de penetración, SIEM) y operaciones de seguridad (respuesta a incidentes, recuperación de desastres, gestión de cambios, manejo de malware).


A través de una combinación de instrucción teórica detallada, ejemplos prácticos del mundo real y técnicas estratégicas de preparación para el examen, este curso capacita a los estudiantes no solo para aprobar el desafiante examen CISSP con confianza, sino también para convertirse en líderes altamente efectivos y estratégicos, capaces de salvaguardar los activos más valiosos de una organización en el complejo panorama de amenazas actual.


¿Para Quién es Este Curso?
Profesionales de TI experimentados que buscan especializarse y avanzar en sus carreras dentro del dominio de la ciberseguridad.
Analistas de Seguridad, Ingenieros, Consultores y Gerentes de Seguridad que buscan validar su amplia experiencia y lograr reconocimiento global.
Individuos que persiguen la Certificación CISSP para demostrar su dominio de las mejores prácticas de seguridad de la información y abrir nuevas oportunidades profesionales.
Cualquier persona responsable de diseñar, implementar, gestionar o supervisar el programa y la infraestructura de seguridad de la información de una organización.
Tomadores de decisiones y arquitectos que necesitan una comprensión integral de los principios de seguridad para tomar decisiones estratégicas informadas.


Requisitos:
Experiencia Profesional: Si bien la experiencia laboral formal no es un prerrequisito para inscribirse en este curso de capacitación, es crucial tener en cuenta que (ISC)² exige un mínimo de cinco años de experiencia laboral acumulada, remunerada y a tiempo completo en dos o más de los ocho dominios del CISSP CBK para ser elegible para la certificación CISSP. Este curso está diseñado para construir y mejorar el conocimiento fundamental existente.
Conocimientos Fundamentales de TI y Ciberseguridad: Se recomienda encarecidamente una sólida comprensión de los conceptos básicos de redes (por ejemplo, TCP/IP, protocolos comunes), sistemas operativos (Windows, Linux), infraestructura de servidores y principios generales de seguridad de TI para maximizar su experiencia de aprendizaje.
Fuerte Compromiso con el Estudio: Este es un curso riguroso y profundo que cubre una gran cantidad de material. El éxito requiere una dedicación significativa, estudio independiente y participación activa en discusiones y ejercicios.


Objetivos de Aprendizaje:
Al completar con éxito este curso, los participantes podrán:
Aplicar Estratégicamente los Principios de Gestión de la Seguridad y el Riesgo: Comprender e implementar marcos de gobernanza, procesos de gestión de riesgos, cumplimiento legal y normativo (por ejemplo, GDPR, HIPAA) y consideraciones éticas dentro de un contexto organizacional.
Gestionar Eficazmente la Seguridad de los Activos: Clasificar, etiquetar y manejar información sensible, implementar controles de privacidad robustos, gestionar políticas de retención de datos y ejecutar estrategias de saneamiento de medios y prevención de pérdida de datos (DLP) a lo largo de todo el ciclo de vida de los datos.
Diseñar y Diseñar Arquitecturas Seguras: Aplicar varios modelos de seguridad (por ejemplo, Bell-LaPadula, Biba), utilizar principios de diseño seguro (por ejemplo, defensa en profundidad, menor privilegio) y dominar la criptografía (simétrica, asimétrica, hashing) e Infraestructura de Clave Pública (PKI) para construir sistemas resilientes.
Implementar una Seguridad Robusta de Comunicación y Red: Diseñar y asegurar arquitecturas de red utilizando firewalls, VLAN, proxies y segmentación. Implementar canales de comunicación seguros (VPN, TLS, IPSec) e identificar ataques de red comunes y técnicas de detección.
Administrar el Acceso y la Identidad Avanzados (IAM): Diferenciar y aplicar varios métodos de identificación, autenticación (incluido MFA) y autorización. Implementar modelos de control de acceso (DAC, MAC, RBAC, ABAC) y gestionar todo el ciclo de vida de la identidad, desde el aprovisionamiento hasta la revocación.
Realizar Evaluaciones y Pruebas de Seguridad Exhaustivas: Planificar y ejecutar diferentes tipos de evaluaciones de seguridad (auditorías, revisiones, pruebas), realizar escaneo de vulnerabilidades y pruebas de penetración, comprender los ejercicios de equipos rojos/azules y utilizar métricas de seguridad y KPI para la mejora continua.
Ejecutar Operaciones de Seguridad Integrales: Desarrollar y gestionar planes de respuesta a incidentes, realizar análisis forenses digitales, implementar la gestión de cambios y configuración, supervisar el registro y la monitorización, gestionar las operaciones de recuperación ante desastres y continuidad del negocio, y proteger los recursos críticos.
Integrar la Seguridad en el Desarrollo de Software: Comprender el Ciclo de Vida de Desarrollo de Software Seguro (SDLC) y las prácticas de codificación segura (por ejemplo, OWASP Top 10). Implementar la seguridad en entornos DevOps, CI/CD y Agile, y realizar diversas técnicas de prueba de software y modelado de amenazas para aplicaciones.
Dominar las Estrategias de Preparación para el Examen CISSP: Utilizar técnicas probadas para estudiar, comprender los tipos de preguntas, gestionar el tiempo de forma eficaz durante el examen y aplicar atajos mentales para maximizar sus posibilidades de aprobar la certificación CISSP en el primer intento.
target_audience: Profesionales de TI experimentados que buscan especializarse y avanzar en sus carreras dentro del dominio de la ciberseguridad.
Analistas de Seguridad, Ingenieros, Consultores y Gerentes de Seguridad que buscan validar su amplia experiencia y lograr reconocimiento global.
Individuos que persiguen la Certificación CISSP para demostrar su dominio de las mejores prácticas de seguridad de la información y abrir nuevas oportunidades profesionales.
Cualquier persona responsable de diseñar, implementar, gestionar o supervisar el programa y la infraestructura de seguridad de la información de una organización.
Tomadores de decisiones y arquitectos que necesitan una comprensión integral de los principios de seguridad para tomar decisiones estratégicas informadas.

courses.title: Introdução a mitigação de ataques DDoS
courses.bio: Introdução a mitigação de ataques DDoS
objectives: NetFlow
Análise de trafego
Introdução a ataques cibernéticos
Ferramentas para identificação de ataques de DDoS
Mitigação de ataques DDoS

Introdução: Preparando o cenário e apresentando o laboratório
FastNetmon: Instalação e configuração do FastNetmon e Simulação de ataques

requirements: Familiaridade com Linux
Conhecimentos básicos em redes TCP/IP
Entendimento básico de BGP e Roteamento
courses.description:
Neste curso, vamos explorar de forma geral como funciona um dos métodos de mitigação de ataques DDoS. Ele foi especialmente desenvolvido para pessoas que não possuem conhecimento prévio sobre o tema, com o objetivo principal de explicar de maneira clara e acessível a essência de um sistema de mitigação.
O foco será apresentar um estudo de caso prático sobre a mitigação de ataques DDoS, utilizando ferramentas e sistemas open-source. Este curso serve como uma introdução para que você adquira uma base sólida sobre o funcionamento de uma mitigação. Embora abordemos alguns conceitos de roteamento, este não será o foco principal.
Você aprenderá a integrar diferentes componentes para monitorar e mitigar ataques DDoS de forma eficiente, reduzindo o impacto de ataques cada vez mais sofisticados. Com o avanço do uso de inteligência artificial para criar ameaças mais complexas — popularmente conhecidas como "bad IA" —, torna-se essencial estar preparado para enfrentar esses desafios.
"Se você conhece o inimigo e conhece a si mesmo, não precisa temer o resultado de cem batalhas. Se você se conhece, mas não conhece o inimigo, para cada vitória ganha, sofrerá também uma derrota. Se você não conhece nem o inimigo nem a si mesmo, perderá todas as batalhas."
— Sun Tzu
target_audience: Desenvolvedores
Analistas de Rede
Analistas SOC
DevSecOps
Analistas de NOC N1/N2/N3
NetOps

courses.title: curso de hacking ético para principiantes: practica con CTFs
courses.bio: Aprende técnicas de ataque y pentesting practicando con maquinas vulnerables, practicando en entornos controlados
objectives: Aprenderás a utilizar las principales herramientas de hacking
A utilizar Kali Linux y muchas de las herramientas que tiene incorporadas
Fundamentos de la Ciberseguridad ofensiva
Comprender la metodología de Ethical Hacking
Aprender a detectar y explotar vulnerabilidades
Aprenderás el manejo de Linux
requirements: Solamente requieres de conocimientos básicos en IT.
Una computadora con: procesador compatible con la tecnología de virtualización (por ejemplo, Intel VT-x o AMD VT).
Por lo menos, 100GB libres de disco duro. Se recomienda de 300GB en adelante.
Mínimo con 4GB en RAM; se sugieren de 8GB en RAM en adelante.
Ganas de aprender Hacking, Seguridad Informatica y Ciberseguridad
courses.description:
El presente curso busca servir como punto de partida o inicio al mundo del hacking ético o ethical hacking, sin importar los conocimientos previos del alumno.


Se llevara al alumno paso a paso para que comprenda los pasos para que pueda llevar a cabo de inicio a fin un ciclo de las fases del ethical hacking.


Los ataques informáticos o ciberataques en la actualidad se han incrementando de forma exponencial en los últimos años y han permitido a los cibercriminales poder acceder a datos confidenciales y poder dañar de gran manera tanto personas como empresas mediante sus altos conocimientos informáticos y aprovechandose del desconocimiento de estas tecnicas utilizadas por estos.


Esto ha provocado en todo el mundo una enorme demanda de profesionales en hacking ético capaces de poder ejecutar ataques controlados para encontrar los problemas de seguridad de los sistemas antes que los cibercriminales.


Con este curso se aprendera desde cero desde como podemos utilizar las herramientas de virtualización como VMWARE y Virtualbox para tener entornos controlados para poder practicar, pasando a conocer tambien comandos de Linux, hasta a llegar a tener los fundamentos de como podemos escanear, encontrar vulnerabilidades, explotar estas vulnerabilidades y poder tener acceso a estas maquinas, podiendo conocer a detalle diferentes metodos de tener control total de la maquina, todo de una manera facil.


Utilizaremos las mejores y más eficaces herramientas de hacking como hydra, nmap, metasploit framework, nessus y muchos más.
target_audience: Cualquier persona con la curiosidad de iniciar en el mundo del ethical hacking
Personas que no tengan mucho conocimiento, pero tengas las ganas de querer aprender sobre hacking ético
Interesados en adentrarse al mundo CTF (Por ejemplo; HacktheBox, Vulnhub, etc)
El curso está dirigido para principiantes en la parte de TI

courses.description: In WLAN part 1 we will study what is WLAN, introduction about Wi-Fi networks and how it works, also we will know about radio frequencies and WLAN channels and main differences between them, also we will study what is received signal strength indicator and how it help us to decide if our network design is good enough or it need some modification, also we will know about the two frequencies 2.4 and 5 GHz ,and when to use one of the over the other ,and what is the benefits and weaknesses of each frequency ,we will also will study wave propagation ,and some parameters related to the wave like wave length , frequency and what is the relation between them, and how there changes affect the coverage area of our Wi-Fi network, We will study the Wi-Fi channels at 2.4GHz freq , and 5 GHz channels, and how to make channel planning to avoid the interference ,after this part I will introduce part 2 which will include antenna system for Wi-Fi , and types of them, also will include Wi-Fi network devices and structure ,wireless network traffic flow, link budgeting and WLAN design and optimization, hoping this part be useful for you.

courses.title: CyberArk Identity na prática
courses.bio: Arquitetura, planejamento, instalação do conector, resolução de problema, análise de logs e conf inicial do portal.
objectives: Arquitetura do CyberArk Identity, nível de parceria com AWS, certificações CyberArk e serviços disponíveis no conector.
Planejamento do conector, LB e HA, DC preferencial, estender schema, rede e firewall, filiais, MFA na VPN, atualização etc.
Instalação do conector CyberArk Identity, validação e resolução de problema.
Análise dos logs do conector quando usuário é bloqueado, quando temos DC offline, validar configuração RADIUS e conta expirada.

Introdução: Apresentação e demonstração do CyberArk Identity Holística
Mapa mental MFA e primeiro acesso
Fase 1: Arquitetura e status do serviço CyberArk Identity
Fase 2: Instalação do conector e resolução de problemas

requirements: Conhecimento de Windows e redes.
courses.description:
INTRODUÇÃO
Olá a todos :D
Sou Tiago Toledo, aka Tiago Bigode, o objetivo aqui é apresentar o CyberArk Identity de forma simples e objetiva.


Além de apresentar de forma holística, irei adentrar em diversos detalhes que julgo importante e que em nenhum momento do treinamento oficial é mencionado.


Versão no momento da gravação do curso:
- Conector: 22.11.207
- Tenant: 22.11.208


Por que desse treinamento?
Esse treinamento foi criado com base na minha experiencia, após ler a documentação e fazer o treinamento oficial.
Pensando em uma forma mais pratica e didática de aprendizado, elaborei documento top das galáxias.
Onde tem informações sobre os módulos e licenciamento, arquitetura, planejamento da implementação do conector e o passo a passo de como executar cada das etapas. Está lindo demais. #confia
A ideia desse documento é centralizar as informações, separando os assuntos por tópicos, fica mais organizado, para achar qualquer coisa é mais fácil e obviamente pesquisar por palavra-chave de forma centralizada.


Curso simples, mas objetivo e prático.


Para quem se destina esse treinamento?

courses.title: Hacking Éthique : Apprendre L'analyse Forensique
courses.bio: Maîtrisez L'analyse Forensique dans une Approche de Hacking Éthique
objectives: Identifier les signes d'un ordinateur piraté ou infecté
Acquérir des compétences recherchés dans le marché de la cybersécurité
Mise en place de mesures de prévention et de protection
Protéger votre ordinateur contre les attaques informatiques le plus courantes

Chapitre 2 : Suppression Sécurisé de Fic: Vos Fichiers sont t'il vraiment supprimé ?
Suppression de Fichiers Sécurisé sur Windows
Quiz sur La Suppression de Fichiers Windows
Chapitre 3 : Backdoor et Réseau: Detecter un Programme Malveillants Caché avec Task Manager
Quiz sur Le Backdoor et Réseau

requirements: Aucune connaissance préalable en matière de sécurité informatique n'est requise . Cependant, pour une expérience optimale, l'utilisation d'écouteurs peut améliorer la qualité audio lors des sessions mais cela reste optionnel.
courses.description:
Bienvenue dans le cours ultime de cybersécurité orienté Forensique sur Udemy.
Plongez dans le monde captivant de l’analyse forensique informatique avec notre formation complète, mêlant théorie, démonstrations et mise en pratique concrète. Apprenez à retracer les activités passées, récupérer des données supprimées, identifier des connexions suspectes, et maîtriser les outils essentiels pour renforcer votre posture de cybersécurité.
Chapitre 1 : Historique de l’Ordinateur
Découvrez comment un ordinateur garde des traces de tout ce qui s’y passe. Grâce à des outils forensiques, vous apprendrez à remonter l’historique des activités, comme un véritable enquêteur numérique. Vous verrez également comment ces traces peuvent être effacées, et pourquoi cela est important dans un contexte d’enquête ou de cybersécurité.
Chapitre 2 : Suppression Sécurisée de Fichiers sur Windows
Croyez-vous que supprimer un fichier via la corbeille le fait disparaître à jamais ? Détrompez-vous. Dans ce chapitre, vous apprendrez pourquoi les fichiers supprimés peuvent souvent être récupérés, même après vidage de la corbeille. Vous utiliserez des outils professionnels pour restaurer des fichiers effacés, puis découvrirez comment les supprimer de manière définitive et sécurisée, sans aucune possibilité de récupération.
Chapitre 3 : Backdoors et Réseau
Plongez dans le concept des backdoors : ces accès cachés que des attaquants laissent derrière eux. Apprenez à analyser les connexions réseau de votre machine pour détecter des activités suspectes, à scruter les processus en cours, et à identifier les programmes de démarrage qui pourraient cacher des mécanismes de persistance. Vous utiliserez des outils intégrés comme le Gestionnaire de tâches pour mener votre propre investigation.


Objectif final : Vous permettre d’adopter une approche d’enquêteur numérique, capable de comprendre, retracer, et analyser les événements ayant eu lieu sur une machine suspecte. Tout cela en gardant une posture d’éthique et de protection des systèmes.
Pourquoi ce cours?
Apprentissage Progressif: Chaque chapitre commence par une base théorique accessible à tous, suivie immédiatement par des exercices pratiques.
Expérience Interactive: Mettez en pratique vos connaissances avec des exercices simulés pour renforcer votre compréhension.
Expertise Accessible: Pas besoin d'être un génie de l'informatique pour suivre ce cours; nous parlons votre langue tout en vous transformant en un défenseur numérique.
Préparez vous à apprendre un aspect des plus important dans le monde de la cybersécurité. Protégez vous, protégez vos données, et faites un pas de plus vers une maîtrise totale du monde numérique. Rejoignez nous dès maintenant et transformez votre avenir numérique!.
target_audience: Toute personnes désireuse de s'améliorer en sécurité informatique

Les utilisateurs réguliers d'Internet : Si vous utilisez fréquemment des appareils connectés à internet, ce cours vous aidera à mieux comprendre les menaces potentielles et à prendre des mesures pour vous protéger.

Les professionnels cherchant à élargir leurs connaissances : Même pour ceux qui travaillent dans des domaines non techniques, acquérir une compréhension de base de la cybersécurité peut être utile dans un monde de plus en plus numérique.

courses.description:
Olá,
Bem-vindo ao meu "Teste completo de invasão e penetração de aplicativos da Web".
Os aplicativos da Web rodam o mundo. De mídia social a aplicativos de negócios, quase todas as organizações possuem um aplicativo da Web e fazem negócios online. Então, vemos uma ampla gama de aplicativos sendo entregues todos os dias.
Neste curso, você aprenderá como usar as ferramentas black hat de hackers e seguir seus caminhos para comprometer os aplicativos da web.
Este curso o levará do nível iniciante ao avançado. Você aprenderá a hackear e testar a penetração de aplicativos da Web passo a passo com demonstrações práticas.
Vamos começar descobrindo quais são os problemas de segurança que estão atualmente no campo e aprender metodologias e tipos de teste. Em seguida, vamos construir um ambiente de laboratório para você aplicar o que você obtém do curso e, claro, o laboratório se foi e não custou nada. Então vamos começar com alguma teoria, você sabe, você deve ter a filosofia para que possamos estar sempre na mesma página.
Tecnologias básicas da web e da Internet, como HTML, HTTP, Document Object Model e assim por diante, são absolutamente necessárias para que possamos completar a experiência de teste. E então cobriremos a seção de reconhecimento, reuniremos informações sobre o alvo e como usar essas informações para modelar um ataque. Depois disso, abordaremos os problemas de gerenciamento de usuários. Além disso, também tentaremos expor os problemas de gerenciamento de sessão.
Na seção de validação de entrada, mostraremos por que a validação de dados é absolutamente importante para aplicativos da web. Portanto, ataques como Cross-Site Scripting, SQL Injection e muitos mais, vamos examinar um monte de tipos diferentes. Também temos uma seção de criptografia com alguns ataques básicos. Depois disso, discutiremos alguns ataques de aplicativos da Web conhecidos (como injeção de Drupal SQL, também conhecida como Druppageddon).


Ao final do curso, você aprenderá;
Metodologias e tipos de teste,
Tecnologias básicas da Web e da Internet, como HTML, HTTP, Document Object Model e assim por diante,
Para coletar informações sobre o alvo e usar essas informações para modelar um ataque.
Problemas de gerenciamento de usuários.
Expondo os problemas de gerenciamento de sessão.
Data de validade
Ataques como Cross-Site Scripting, SQL Injection e muitos mais
Alguns ataques básicos em criptografia
Ataques a aplicativos da Web, como injeção de Drupal SQL (também conhecido como Druppageddon)
E mais para enriquecer suas habilidades de teste de penetração.


Qualidade de produção de vídeo e áudio
Todos os nossos vídeos são criados / produzidos como vídeo e áudio de alta qualidade para fornecer a você o melhor experiência de aprendizado.


Você será,
Vendo claramente
Ouvindo claramente
Movendo-se pelo curso sem distrações


Você também obterá:
Acesso vitalício ao curso
Suporte rápido e amigável na seção de perguntas e respostas
Certificado de conclusão da Udemy pronto para download


Mergulhe agora!
Oferecemos total suporte, esclarecendo suas dúvidas.
Vejo você no curso!


IMPORTANTE: Este curso foi criado para fins educacionais e todas as informações aprendidas devem ser utilizadas quando o invasor for autorizado.

courses.description:
Welcome to "Mastering Termux: Your Portable Linux Environment," an in-depth course crafted for individuals eager to harness the power of Termux, a versatile terminal emulator and Linux environment that runs seamlessly on Android devices. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, a novice programmer, or an experienced developer, this course is designed to provide you with the essential skills needed to leverage Termux effectively and efficiently.


In this course, we will start with the basics, guiding you through the installation of Termux and familiarizing you with its user-friendly interface. You will learn to navigate the command line, mastering fundamental and advanced operations that are crucial for system management and development tasks. We will delve into the vast repository of packages available within Termux, empowering you to install and utilize various tools tailored to your needs.


A significant portion of the course will focus on automation through scripting. You will learn how to write and execute shell scripts, enabling you to automate repetitive tasks and streamline your workflow. This skill is invaluable for enhancing productivity and efficiency, particularly in development environments.


Additionally, we will explore how to integrate Termux with various development tools, allowing you to code, compile, and test applications directly from your mobile device. You will discover practical applications of Termux in areas such as network diagnostics, penetration testing, and remote system administration.


By the end of this course, you will possess the confidence and expertise to use Termux as a powerful tool in your tech arsenal. Join us on this journey to unlock the full potential of your Android device and elevate your skills in programming, automation, and system management. Enroll today and start mastering Termux!
target_audience: Students will become proficient in using basic and advanced command-line operations within Termux, enabling them to perform tasks such as file management, package installation, and system configuration

objectives: Cung cấp kiến thức cần thiết để làm việc như một Chuyên viên An ninh mạng tập sự.
Giúp học viên nắm vững các cách giám sát mạng và đánh giá các cảnh báo bảo mật.
Trang bị kỹ năng sử dụng các công cụ và kỹ thuật bảo vệ mạng, bao gồm kiểm soát truy cập, tường lửa, bảo mật đám mây và mã hóa.
Hỗ trợ học viên phát triển chiến lược an ninh mạng đa lớp để bảo vệ mạng khỏi các cuộc tấn công và phản ứng nhanh chóng trước bất kỳ khai thác nào có thể xảy ra

requirements: Học viên cần có kiến thức cơ bản về mạng máy tính và an ninh mạng.
Nên có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công cụ bảo mật cơ bản và hiểu biết về các giao thức mạng.
Nên hoàn thành khóa học Bảo mật thiết bị đầu cuối (Endpoint security)
courses.description:
Chào bạn
Khóa học "Phòng thủ hệ thống mạng" cung cấp kiến thức trung cấp cần thiết cho vai trò của một Chuyên viên An ninh mạng tập sự. Khóa học này hướng dẫn học viên cách giám sát mạng và đánh giá các cảnh báo bảo mật, đồng thời đào sâu vào các công cụ và kỹ thuật bảo vệ mạng như kiểm soát truy cập, tường lửa, bảo mật đám mây và mã hóa. Ngoài ra bạn sẽ biết cách dùng AI để hỗ trợ cho việc phòng thủ mạng.
Khóa học tập trung vào việc xây dựng một chiến lược an ninh mạng đa lớp, nhằm tạo ra một hệ thống phòng thủ nhiều lớp, từ đó bảo vệ mạng trước các cuộc tấn công và phản ứng nhanh chóng trước bất kỳ khai thác nào có thể xảy ra.
Các công cụ và phương pháp giám sát và bảo vệ mạng được giảng dạy trong khóa học sẽ giúp học viên phát triển các kỹ năng và kiến thức cần thiết để bảo vệ mạng khỏi nhiều loại hình tấn công.
Đối tượng tham gia khóa học là những người theo đuổi sự nghiệp an ninh mạng, chuyên viên IT muốn nâng cao kỹ năng, và sinh viên ngành công nghệ thông tin.
Khóa học Network Defense không chỉ trang bị cho học viên những kiến thức lý thuyết cần thiết mà còn cung cấp các kỹ năng thực tiễn quan trọng để áp dụng trong công việc thực tế. Học viên sẽ học cách xây dựng và triển khai các biện pháp bảo vệ mạng hiệu quả, từ đó giúp họ tự tin hơn trong vai trò của một Chuyên viên An ninh mạng chuyên nghiệp.
Chúc các bạn thành công
target_audience: Những người muốn theo đuổi sự nghiệp trong lĩnh vực an ninh mạng.
Chuyên viên IT muốn nâng cao kiến thức và kỹ năng bảo mật mạng.
Sinh viên ngành công nghệ thông tin và an ninh mạng.

courses.title: Sip And Media Security
courses.bio: Les mécanismes de sécurisation cryptographiques appliqués au protocole Sip
objectives: Apprendre les mécanismes de chiffrement, hashage, d'authentification dans leurs aspects purement conceptuels dans un premier temps
Apprendre la composition d'une infrastructure de confiance et la notion de certificat
Apprendre le principe de fonctionnement du TLS (Transport Layer Security)
Apprendre les différents modèles de référence pour sécuriser une signalisation SIP (Session Initiation Protocol)
Apprendre les différents modèles de référence pour sécuriser le média (la voix)
Apprendre comment sécuriser un trunk SIP
Apprendre des attaques possible en téléphonie
Apprendre comment contrer les attaques par la mise en place de certains outils de sécurité
Vous apprendrez aussi un outil pratique en matière de hacking VoIP

Partie II : Chiffrement: les types de chiffrement : asymétrique, symétrique et signature électronique
Partie IV : Transport Layer Security (TL: principe de fonctionnement de TLS, le handshake TLS
Partie V : Securisation de la signalisat: TLS client, TLS mutuel, implémentation intradomaine et interdomaine
Partie VI : Securisation du média RTP: les attributs crypto dans le SDP, le protocole SRTP, sdescriptions et le DTLS
Partie VII : Securisation d'un Trunk SIP: architecture d'entreprise et renforcement de la sécurisation

requirements: être familier aux notions basique de la cryptographie
être familier aux notions basiques du protocole SIP
être familier aux architectures de téléphonie
courses.description:
La sécurité est un enjeu majeur dans les services et réseaux de télécommunications en règle générale, et la voix n’en est pas une exception.
Ce cours vous présente les différents aspects de sécurité relatifs au protocole SIP.
Du chiffrement aux techniques de protection en passant par les failles existentielles qu’on peut retrouver au niveau de la voix, ce module est très bien conçu pour tenir compte des enjeux de la sécurité dans vos implémentations SIP que ce soit du Trunk SIP ou autre.
La sécurisation de la signalisation SIP et celle du flux média y sont bien abordées avec surtout les attributs cryptographiques apparaissant dans le message body SIP (algorithme de hashage, algorithme de chiffrement et bien d’autres).
De plus, l’avantage de ce cours est qu’il fait une passe sur le TLS et son fonctionnement, présente la PKI (Public Key Infrastructure) donnant ainsi la notion de certificat aux participants, aborde les outils existants pour construire ou bloquer des attaques SIP.
En option à ce contenu, vous avez, si vous le souhaitez, la possibilité de faire un hacklab.
le contenu du cours se présente comme suit :
Partie I: Authentication and Authorization
Sip Proxy Authentication
Algorithmes de Hashage
Partie II : Chiffrement
Contexte
Types de chiffrement
Signature Numérique
Partie III : Public Key Infrastructure (PKI)
CSR, certificat
Architecture & composants
Partie IV : Transport Layer Security (TLS)
Principe de fonctionnement du TLS
Partie V : Securisation de la signalisation SIP
TLS client vs TLS mutuel
Implementation intra-domain vs implementation inter-domain
Mandatory TLS vs best effort TLS
Partie VI : Securisation du média RTP
les attributs crypto dans le SDP
SRTP/SRTCP
sdes et les attributs ‘crypto’
DTLS
Partie VII : Securisation d'un Trunk SIP
Partie VIII : Attaques et Solutions
Les types d’attaques
Appel détourné
Un exemple de phishing avec un rogue proxy
Les types de protection
Les outils pratiques d’analyses
Crackage d'un mot de passe
target_audience: Professionnels (ingénieurs, experts ou exploitants) du monde de la téléphonie
Etudiants en école d'ingénieur réseaux télécoms
Etudiants en BTS

courses.bio: learn Nmap From Scratch
objectives: Nmap is a free, open-source port scanner available for both UNIX and Windows. It has an optional graphical front-end, NmapFE, and supports a wide variety of sca
Nmap is a free, open-source port scanner available for both UNIX and Windows. It has an optional graphical front-end, NmapFE, and supports a wide variety of sca

Nmap is a free, open-source port scanner available for both UNIX and Windows. It has an optional graphical front-end, NmapFE, and supports a wide variety of sca
requirements: no experience needed
courses.description:
Nmap is a free, open-source port scanner available for both UNIX and Windows. It has an optional graphical front-end, NmapFE, and supports a wide variety of scan types, each one with different benefits and drawbacks.
This article describes some of these scan types, explaining their relative benefits and just how they actually work. It also offers tips about which types of scan would be best against which types of host.
The article assumes you have Nmap installed (or that you know how to install it. Instructions are available on the Nmap website, and that you have the required privileges to run the scans detailed (many scans require root or Administrator privileges).
A frequently asked questions section has been added since the first version of this article, and this is included as the last section in this version. This is a fully revised and updated version of this tutorial, re-typed and converted to a TeX format, allowing more output formats to be utilised. At the time of writing, the latest Nmap version was 4.11.Nmap is a free, open-source port scanner available for both UNIX and Windows. The article assumes you have Nmap installed (or that you know how to install it. Instructions are available on the Nmap website, and that you have the required privileges to run the scans detailed (many scans require root or Administrator privileges).

This is a fully revised and updated version of this tutorial, re-typed and converted to a TeX format, allowing more output formats to be utilised. courses.title: B端产品的权限设计·理论篇
courses.bio: 有人的地方就有“权限结构”
objectives: 权限系统
权限模型
权限设计的操作方法
页面权限
requirements: 有2年+产品工作经验，了解系统规划
courses.description:
很多企业都有属于自己的后台系统，在后台系统中会有很多权限的设计，权限控制是管理后台的重要功能，可以有效的提高系统的安全性，减少误操作、数据泄漏等风险的发生。一个好用的权限系统可以更灵活的进行管理，提高效率。为此，三节课特别邀请到操盘过10+百万级商业项目，拥有丰富产品设计经验的城南老师，带你深入走进权限的江湖，认识它并驾驭它。
本课程分为“理论篇”与“实战篇”两部分，本节课为“理论篇”，将首先带你了解权限系统的定义、价值与重要概念，并进一步为你讲解常见的权限模型。
本节课程是由授课老师与三节课合作制作的。在此，要特别感谢老师的辛苦付出！经历了课程立项、设计、开发中的众多环节，我们才能最终为你呈现现在的这门课程。无论是授课老师还是三节课团队，都希望这门课程能够让你有所收获，希望同学们结合个人工作情况，学以致用。

courses.title: Blockchain - curso didático para leigos e intermediários.
courses.bio: Como funciona a Blockchain
objectives: O que é Blockchain
Por que a Blockchain do Bitcoin é diferente das demais
A segurança da Blockchain do Bitcoin
Antifragilidade do Bitcoin

BLOCKCHAIN: Conceitos da Escola Austríaca de Economia

requirements: Não é necessário ter nenhum conhecimento prévio sobre o assunto.
courses.description:
Primeiramente parabéns por ser a exceção à regra, estar procurando conhecimento sobre um tema que a maioria ainda não compreende. Esse diferencial costuma ser positivo.

Este curso não é recomendado para pessoas de conhecimento avançado em Bitcoin.
É sim destinado aos iniciantes a intermediários, expondo de forma didática o funcionamento da Blockchain.
Explica o porque da Blockchain do Bitcoin sempre será a mais segura.
Bem como a, praticamente, impossibilidade de alterar qualquer dado na Blockchain.
É um curso que te faz ver na prática os blocos se formando.

Aprendo e me dedico a ensinar sobre o Bitcoin a outras pessoas há mais de cinco anos.
Minha meta com o curso foi tornar o mais simples e didático disponível na internet.

O conteúdo do curso surpreende pelas horas/aulas. Porém valorizar o tempo é uma premissa de todos bitcoiners, valorizo o teu tempo te passando um ótimo conteúdo em tempo curto facilitando seu entendimento pela didática apresentada.
Além disso, qualquer atualização será de livre acesso a todos que comprarem o curso. Sim, acesso vitalício ao curso e todas atualizações.

Você compra, assiste, e se em 7 dias você não gostar do conteúdo ou da didática devolvemos teu dinheiro mediante Feedback.


Os inscritos no curso ganharão desconto em todos demais cursos lançados por mim.
Lembrando que a proposta final é um curso que abarque tudo que envolve o "Bitcoin - Bitcoin do 0 ao Full"; que será formado por todos os cursos menores feitos.
Ou seja, serão feitos cursos sobre a parte econômica, a parte filosófica, a parte prática, etc.
target_audience: Todas pessoas que desejam entender o que é Blockchain e Bitcoin

courses.title: Shopos NextGen Firewall Mastery: Advanced Security Course
courses.bio: "Defend, Configure, and Conquer: Advanced Cybersecurity with Shopos NextGen Firewall"
objectives: Master Shopos NextGen Firewall: Gain a comprehensive understanding of Shopos NextGen Firewall, covering key concepts, features, and functionalities.
Configuration and Optimization: Learn to configure and optimize Shopos NextGen Firewall for different network scenarios, ensuring efficient and secure operation
Firewall Policy Management: Explore the intricacies of firewall policies, understanding how to design and implement rules that enhance network security
VPN Configurations: Acquire hands-on experience in setting up Virtual Private Networks with Shopos Firewall, enabling secure communication across Network
Intrusion Prevention Strategies: Dive into advanced intrusion prevention techniques, developing skills to detect and mitigate potential threats effectively.
Real-world Scenarios and Labs: Apply theoretical knowledge to practical situations through hands-on labs and real-world scenarios.

requirements: Basic Networking Knowledge: A fundamental understanding of networking concepts, including IP addressing, subnetting, and routing, is recommended.

courses.description:
"Embark on a transformative journey into advanced cybersecurity with our 'Shopos NextGen Firewall Mastery' course, designed for cybersecurity enthusiasts, network security professionals, and system administrators. Delve into the intricate world of Shopos NextGen Firewall and emerge as a skilled defender against evolving cyber threats.
This comprehensive program covers the spectrum of Shopos NextGen Firewall capabilities, offering a deep dive into firewall policies, VPN configurations, and cutting-edge intrusion prevention strategies. Gain hands-on experience in configuring and optimizing Shopos NextGen Firewall for diverse network scenarios, ensuring both efficiency and security.
Key highlights include mastering VPN setup for secure communication, exploring advanced intrusion prevention techniques, and translating theoretical knowledge into practical scenarios through hands-on labs. This course empowers you with the skills to fortify networks against sophisticated cyber threats, making you a valuable asset in the ever-changing landscape of cybersecurity.
Whether you're a seasoned professional or an enthusiast eager to deepen your cybersecurity expertise, enroll now to elevate your skills and become a proficient defender with Shopos NextGen Firewall."
Key Learning Points:
Comprehensive Firewall Mastery: Navigate through Shopos NextGen Firewall features, understanding their applications in different scenarios.
Efficient Configuration Techniques: Learn to configure and optimize Shopos NextGen Firewall for optimal performance and security.
In-Depth VPN Expertise: Acquire practical skills in setting up Virtual Private Networks (VPNs), ensuring secure communication across networks.
Advanced Intrusion Prevention: Dive deep into advanced techniques for detecting and mitigating potential threats effectively.
Real-world Application: Translate theoretical knowledge into practical scenarios through hands-on labs and simulations.
Equip yourself with the skills needed to fortify networks against evolving cyber threats. Enroll now and master advanced cybersecurity with Shopos NextGen Firewall."
target_audience: Network Security Professionals: Individuals working in the field of network security who want to deepen their expertise in utilizing Shopos NextGen Firewall for advanced cybersecurity measures.

requirements: Conocimientos básicos de computación, sistemas operativos y redes de computadoras
courses.description:
¿Quieres adentrarte en el mundo del hacking, pero no sabes por dónde empezar?
En Hacking Arsenal Setup aprenderás cómo armar tu propio laboratorio de hacking y a hackear un objetivo paso a paso, usando la metodología que siguen los hackers éticos y pentesters a nivel global.
Descubre por qué convertirte en hacker ético puede ser la decisión más acertada y lucrativa de tu vida.
Revelado: cómo armar tu laboratorio de hacking desde cero, haciendo uso de hipervisores de manera económica y sencilla.
Aprende a desplegar la suite Kali Linux, catalogada por la comunidad global de hackers como la distribución de seguridad por excelencia, la cual contiene más de 600 herramientas de seguridad diferentes.
Practica reconocimiento, escaneo, análisis de vulnerabilidades, realiza ataques de claves y aprende cómo usar el Metasploit Framework para hackear una máquina víctima.
Experimenta con las herramientas esenciales que debe conocer todo hacker como, por ejemplo, netdiscover, nmap, Nessus, wireshark, hydra, cewl, entre otros.
Averigüa cuáles son los hacking frameworks más populares y en qué se diferencian.
Comprende cómo las bases de vulnerabilidades y exploits pueden ayudarte a lograr a hackear tus objetivos y
Adquiere los conocimientos y habilidades para hackear una máquina víctima paso a paso.
¡Únete ahora y dale vida a tu creatividad hacker!
target_audience: Entusiastas, estudiantes y profesionales de TI y carreras afines que desean incursionar en Hacking Ético y Ciberseguridad
